programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: The wings of cliff swallows in Nebraska are getting shorter – while female turtles in Chesapeake Bay are getting larger. On the Galapagos Islands, two species of finches are developing back into one. Increasing numbers of peregrine falcons are living in urban areas – and have adapted their behaviour: thanks to the city lights, they have learned to hunt at night.

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. After his shift, Eric goes to Yvonne Troemans cook-shop. Her speciality is Kadushi, a cactus soup. The ingredients include cactus flesh, pigtails, mussels and a few secret "treats". Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: glCuba - Brilliantly Caribbean
programme.desc: Even anyone who has not yet been to Cuba can conjure up certain images of American vintage street cruisers, imposing buildings that have seen better days, white sandy beaches full of palms and loving couples on the Malecon against a backdrop of crashing waves. This island is somewhat of a myth and its people generate a special joie de vivre. The legendary Hershey Train departs for Matanzas from the capital, Havana. On the oldest electrified railway line in the Caribbean, 60-year-old Spanish carriages make their way along al-most 100 kilometres of coastline in the most relaxed way possible. The Salvavidas on Varadero, probably the most famous beach on the island, have a particular-ly...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: mareTV: Peru - Coast of the Incas
programme.desc: Dramatically, the coast plunges into the sea, the so-called Costa of Peru is a gigantic desert on the Pacific Ocean, 2,400 kilometers long. Rugged, bizarre, like from another star. Ancient cultures settled here, the Moche and the Chimú. Later the proud Inca, the self-proclaimed royal people of the Andes, ruled. In the small town of Huanchaco in northern Peru, the fishermen build a new boat every month: from reed. The small ships are called Caballito de Totora (reed horses), because the shape is reminiscent of a horse and the fishermen ride in it kneeling in the waves. About 2,000 years ago, the moche used it to go out to sea. Carlos Segura Azola is a descendant of the moche. He is...

programme.title: The Heart of Hawaii - The Island of Oahu
programme.desc: The Oahu island is the economic and cultural centre of the Hawaiian archipelago, as well as being a paradise for surfers, active holidaymakers and freedom lovers. The island is home to more than half of all natives and almost eight million foreign guests annually. Anyone searching for peace and seclusion won’t find either in Honolulu or Waikiki. Traffic congestion and a backdrop of skyscrapers belong to the town panorama. Hip cafes, galleries and young fashion firms have settled here, adding a new and modern flair to the capital. Cindy’s Lei Shoppe, the Chinatown florists, has been here for more than 30 years. This is also because the so-called Leis, the tradition of floral decoration,...

programme.title: mareTV: In Alaskas Fjord World
programme.desc: Gigantic fjords and over 5,000 small islands: In Alaskas south theres a lot of wilderness and little civilization. The region between the capital Juneau and the Canadian border is also known by locals as the "Last Frontier", the last outpost. Michelle Masden, for example, has come to terms with the harsh conditions here. She is the only seaplane pilot in the region. She earns her living with her 65-year-old Beaver: as an air taxi, transport plane and now and then as a rescuer in last necessity. Michelle flies anything and everything: spare parts and food, doctors, hikers and hunters. For the fishermen of southern Alaska she searches for large shoals of fish and guides the captains to...

programme.title: mareTV: Newfoundland - Canadas Eastern Point
programme.desc: In Newfoundland, at the easternmost tip of North America, the landscape is pristine, dramatic, and very sparsely populated. In summer, icebergs occasionally drift along the steep cliffs. When the "Titanic" collided with an iceberg and sank just 300 miles off the coast of Newfoundland in 1912, the last radio messages were picked up in a small wooden hut on the Avalon Peninsula. Today, most Newfoundlanders live on Avalon. There are particularly many seabirds here. In Witless Bay, the newborn puffins are ready for their first descent into the Atlantic. But some stray onto the coastal road, attracted by the lights of the hotels and restaurants. In doing so, they run the risk of being run...

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The U.S. East Coast, The City and the Sea
programme.desc: The journey up the coast continues through Delaware to suburban New Jersey, and onwards into the heart of Manhattan. In Delaware, famous as a corporate tax haven, we visit a winery. In New York City we zip around with a bicycle courier and then head out to Long Island for oysters.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The U.S. East Coast, Florida - The Sunshine State
programme.desc: Nowhere is the American way of life as relaxed as on Floridas beaches. The Keys, a chain of islands at the far southern end of the state, reveal a more laid-back side of the USA. But all of Florida amazes -- with secluded beaches, unspoiled nature, and the legacy of the early European settlers.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The U.S. East Coast, The Heart of New England
programme.desc: From New York, the journey up the coast leads into the heart of New England. We visit Yale; spend some time in the 19th century mansions at Newport, RI; tour the coastal fishing and vacation towns of Massachusetts, and then meet a modern entrepreneur in Boston and see her rooftop gardens.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The U.S. East Coast, Surf And Turf
programme.desc: New Hampshire has only 19 kilometers of coastline and short summers, all the more reason Shauna Fraser takes every opportunity to be by the sea. In the sheltered harbor of Rye, Shauna also targets inner attitude with yoga on a paddleboard.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The U.S. East Coast, The Southern States
programme.desc: We travel from Georgia through the Carolinas to Virginia, ending near Washington, DC. Along the way we meet a Georgia farmer; talk to painter J. Chris Wilson in Charleston; sail along the Outer Banks of Carolina, and visit rural Virginia, experiencing life in the beautiful southern states.

programme.title: mareTV: Mexicos Caribbean Coast
programme.desc: The palm tree laden beaches on Mexicos Riviera Maya on the Yucatan peninsula are endless, and the turquoise sea with its gentle Caribbean surf is a warm 25 degrees during the mild winter in this part of the world. Between Cancún and Punta Allen, where once there was little more than bushland and a few sleepy fishing villages, vibrant life has evolved during the past three decades. Richard Sowa has lived on a floating island for the past 15 years: an island he built himself out of empty plastic bottles. The bon vivant him-self sees it as a "solution for our planets refuse problem". Off Punta Allen, a village in the bay of Sian Kaan, Mexican Mara Coral Ley and her cousin Kim, continue to...

programme.title: mareTV: Martinique
programme.desc: The island of Martinique is a piece of France in the Caribbean, between Florida and South America. And of course, Savoir-vivre applies just as it does on the other side of the Atlantic, between the English Channel and the Mediterranean. Jacky Pascault is the first and only man to cultivate mushrooms in the Caribbean. Everywhere else, they grow on artificially fertilised soil, but Jackys Champignons Tropicaux flourish on sugar cane fibres. Nicole Vilo tailors hats and dresses out of coconut palms. Of course, the catwalk for the models wearing her first collection is one of the countless dream beaches. The Martiniquais sail on boats they call Yole, which have no keel and are therefore...

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. After his shift, Eric goes to Yvonne Troemans cook-shop. Her speciality is Kadushi, a cactus soup. The ingredients include cactus flesh, pigtails, mussels and a few secret "treats". Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: glCuba - Brilliantly Caribbean
programme.desc: Even anyone who has not yet been to Cuba can conjure up certain images of American vintage street cruisers, imposing buildings that have seen better days, white sandy beaches full of palms and loving couples on the Malecon against a backdrop of crashing waves. This island is somewhat of a myth and its people generate a special joie de vivre. The legendary Hershey Train departs for Matanzas from the capital, Havana. On the oldest electrified railway line in the Caribbean, 60-year-old Spanish carriages make their way along al-most 100 kilometres of coastline in the most relaxed way possible. The Salvavidas on Varadero, probably the most famous beach on the island, have a particular-ly...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: mareTV: Peru - Coast of the Incas
programme.desc: Dramatically, the coast plunges into the sea, the so-called Costa of Peru is a gigantic desert on the Pacific Ocean, 2,400 kilometers long. Rugged, bizarre, like from another star. Ancient cultures settled here, the Moche and the Chimú. Later the proud Inca, the self-proclaimed royal people of the Andes, ruled. In the small town of Huanchaco in northern Peru, the fishermen build a new boat every month: from reed. The small ships are called Caballito de Totora (reed horses), because the shape is reminiscent of a horse and the fishermen ride in it kneeling in the waves. About 2,000 years ago, the moche used it to go out to sea. Carlos Segura Azola is a descendant of the moche. He is...

programme.title: The Heart of Hawaii - The Island of Oahu
programme.desc: The Oahu island is the economic and cultural centre of the Hawaiian archipelago, as well as being a paradise for surfers, active holidaymakers and freedom lovers. The island is home to more than half of all natives and almost eight million foreign guests annually. Anyone searching for peace and seclusion won’t find either in Honolulu or Waikiki. Traffic congestion and a backdrop of skyscrapers belong to the town panorama. Hip cafes, galleries and young fashion firms have settled here, adding a new and modern flair to the capital. Cindy’s Lei Shoppe, the Chinatown florists, has been here for more than 30 years. This is also because the so-called Leis, the tradition of floral decoration,...

programme.title: mareTV: In Alaskas Fjord World
programme.desc: Gigantic fjords and over 5,000 small islands: In Alaskas south theres a lot of wilderness and little civilization. The region between the capital Juneau and the Canadian border is also known by locals as the "Last Frontier", the last outpost. Michelle Masden, for example, has come to terms with the harsh conditions here. She is the only seaplane pilot in the region. She earns her living with her 65-year-old Beaver: as an air taxi, transport plane and now and then as a rescuer in last necessity. Michelle flies anything and everything: spare parts and food, doctors, hikers and hunters. For the fishermen of southern Alaska she searches for large shoals of fish and guides the captains to...

Today, most Newfoundlanders live on Avalon. There are particularly many seabirds here. In Witless Bay, the newborn puffins are ready for their first descent into the Atlantic. But some stray onto the coastal road, attracted by the lights of the hotels and restaurants. In doing so, they run the risk of being run...

programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Wildlife Nannies: Grizzly Bears
programme.desc: Grizzly Bears are one of the feature attractions of Grouse Mountain Refuge for Endangered Wildlife, Vancouver.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Wildlife Nannies: Best of the Babies

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Wildlife Nannies: The Rest of the Best
programme.desc: With more than 22 episodes, Wildlife Nannies has shot over 50 stories all over the world. From Salzburg to the beautiful Florida coast, from the breathtaking Canadian wilderness to Berlin – there were many heartwarming stories. This episode is a countdown of the ten stories that touched us the most. Best Of 5 to 1!

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Wildlife Nannies: 2 Baby Raccoons
programme.desc: Two baby raccoons saved from a front yard are in need of special care at Raccoons Bush Wildlife Sanctuary.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Wildlife Nannies: Spa Day
programme.desc: A spa day of back scrubbing, massage and more for the manatees of Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Park.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Wildlife Nannies: Abandoned Fawn
programme.desc: An abandoned fawn is found in woods.and is brought to Fawn Wildlife Rescue Station with a broken leg.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Wildlife Nannies: Orphaned Seals
programme.desc: Along the rugged coast of Aquarium, Vancouver there are orphaned and injured seals that need help.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Wildlife Nannies: Bat Nanny
programme.desc: Will a bat nanny help a bat fledgling learn how to fly and be released back into the night skies?

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Wildlife Nannies: Albino Coati Biene
programme.desc: Albino coati Biene moves to a bigger enclosure and meets her new buddies, two raccoons. Will they get along?

programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Wildlife Nannies: Marmoset Family
programme.desc: A Marmoset family reunion will take place at the Zoo Eberswalde, Germany.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Wildlife Nannies: Little Opossum
programme.desc: A new little opossum has arrived at the SPCA Wildlife Care Center, a real paradise for Floridas opossums

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Wildlife Nannies: Wild Boar Piglet
programme.desc: Wild boar piglet Janis is very excited to rejoin pot-bellied pigs, Schnitzel and Knodel, after an injury.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Wildlife Nannies: Animal Shelter; Babies
programme.desc: Clint and Irene Davy turned their home into a animals shelter when they first arrived on the Gibsons coast.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Wildlife Nannies: Hungry Baby Squirrels
programme.desc: Two hungry baby squirrels arrive at the Silicon Valley‘s Squirrel Wildlife Center, they are fed every 2 hours.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Wildlife Nannies: Shetland Foal Hanna
programme.desc: The vet checks on Shetland foal Hanna, her nanny is really concerned about a wound from surgery. Will it heal?

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Wildlife Nannies: Baby Badgers
programme.desc: Two badgers keep their nanny busy. They must get used to the wilderness and the sounds of other wild animals.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Wildlife Nannies: Baby Gibbon Kim
programme.desc: Baby Gibbon Kim broke her arm and is recovering, but the arm has to heal fully before she can join her family.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Wildlife Nannies: Animals of Aiderbichl
programme.desc: A day with the animals of Aiderbichl, Salzburg, where badly-treated animal are rescued and shown a happy life.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Wildlife Nannies: Seal Pups in Danger
programme.desc: Storms at the North Sea cause many seal pups lose their families. One nanny is on a mission to rescue a pup.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Wildlife Nannies: Mustang Zibby, the "Zorse"
programme.desc: Mustang Zibby is a “zorse“, half zebra half horse. Can she be trained and find her place in the mustang herd?

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Wildlife Nannies: Wild Arc Canada
programme.desc: Wild Arc is a 24/7 animal ER taking in injured animals from all over Vancouver island - a really tough job.

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret World of Herbs - In Latin America
programme.desc: Healing effects, fragrance, and intense flavor – the benefits of herbs were discovered by the indigenous peoples of South America long before Spanish conquistadores subdued the continent. Even today, in the remote regions of South America, life without herbs is unthinkable. For many inhabitants, they provide the sole medicine. For more than two thousand years, this wisdom of the healing powers of nature has been passed down from generation to generation. In Bolivia, the film accompanies ethnobiologist Rainer Bussmann on one of his expeditions documenting which herbs the locals use against which illnesses. The German scientist has spent the last 15 years in the region, focussed on...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret World of Herbs - In the Alps
programme.desc: Secluded for many centuries in inaccessible valleys, the inhabitants of the Alps had no alternative but to rely on the healing powers of nature. A knowledge of herbs was deeply rooted in these mountain-dwellers’ everyday lives – until the twentieth century, when this wisdom became eclipsed by modern academic medicine. Today, Alpine herbs are witnessing a revival, as public interest in regional natural treasures grows. The potential of Alpine herbs is far from exhausted. In the Berchtesgaden Alps, the film shows Hubsi Ilsanker at work as a root-digger, a back-breaking job that has scarcely changed in four hundred years. Authorized by a special historic permit to supply the oldest gentian...

programme.title: The Secret world of Herbs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret world of Herbs - In the Balkans
programme.desc: In the pristine nature and mild climate of southeastern Europe grows a unique diversity of wild plants. Far removed from major industry and polluted soils, the Balkan countries have become the largest exporter of herbs in Europe. In Bulgaria alone, more than 300,000 people work with domestic plants. The business is becoming increasingly lucrative. The film takes us to the Croatian coast. On the Adriatic island of Cres, the audience meets Mladen Dragoslavić. In May, when the sage begins to blossom, this beekeeper has one month to produce his income for an entire year – always with the goal of creating the best sage honey in the Balkans. Given a choice, the bees would never choose sage, for...

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The boat unit contends with an unruly suspect and his equally unpredictable dogs. Two burglary suspects try to claim car trouble when theyre found at the scene of the crime. A repentant meth addict is caught by officers on the brink of his latest relapse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speed of 100mph.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police work a sting that targets drug dealers. An undercover sting discovers narcotics trafficking. Police respond to a burglary in progress and discover a flop house.

programme.desc: Deputies question a woman they believe to be a prostitute working the Las Vegas Strip. A woman tries to pin ownership of drug paraphernalia on an absent friend. A man consents to let officers in his backyard, but he confesses to his own trespasses first.

programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husbands ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle pursuit ends in a take down and recovery of additional evidence. A store employee flags down an officer who steps in to make a theft related arrest. An officer is accompanied by several units in pursuit of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: A routine traffic stop turns into a drug bust when cops turn up evidence of the drivers sizable habit. A suspicious man waiting in a parked car cant explain the incriminating texts on his phone. Two frequent flyers give officers a hard time when pulled over in a well-known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police officers set up a sting operation using a taxi cab in to bust prostitution. A man claims he can’t remember his ‘girlfriend’s’ name when officers suspect the woman is actually a stranger. Female undercover officers set up a sting operation to bust johns.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A prostitute tries to outrun the police during a foot chase. A man claims he can only meet women at motels since he lives with his mom. A prostitute fresh out of jail protests that he’s not trying to return to his old career.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman bursts into tears when pulled over by police. During a sketchy traffic stop, one nervous passenger is quick to help deputies. A suspect blames the contents of his wallet on a stranger.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man on the corner is questioned when he’s wearing gang colors in a gang neighborhood. A muscle car spins its tires at a stop light. A woman’s neighbor steals her ‘special’ plants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bicyclist ends up on the pavement when he tries to out pedal a patrol car. A messy divorce leads to a gun-toting showdown between a Corvette and a Mustang. An angry dog ends up getting the best of a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E05 Grown Men Gone Wild
programme.desc: An irate Wal-Mart shopper wont listen and goes home with the taser special. An incoherent ex-marine struggles to explain why he decked a man. A routine traffic stop yields a truckload of dogs and an undressing maniac.

programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect fights back with his teeth during an arrest. A man tries to get revenge for his lost cell phone. A woman claims her neighbor slashed her tires for no reason.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist a bondsman after a fugitive and his girlfriend refuse to surrender. An officer pulls over a teen who attempts to ingest a bag of marijuana while the officer isn’t looking. An officer makes an arrest after the female suspect has an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a domestic dispute call resulting in an indecent arrest. Officers in Tennessee investigate a house known for drug activity. Officers in Southern California check in with a driver parked in a known drug hotbed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting in a neighborhood. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.sub-title: S26 : E09 Guns, Hash, and Fire Hydrants
programme.desc: A chase becomes a flash flood when a fleeing driver runs into a fire hydrant. An insolent domestic violence suspect claims his girlfriend is a habitual 9-1-1 caller. Officers recover a cornucopia of contraband from a gun-toting couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A DUI suspect with a suspended license claims he’s not drunk. Officers track an armed robber. An armed and dangerous suspect hides from Officers in an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.desc: Reno stumbles into a man-hunt for brothers wanted for armed robbery and the confrontation results in the shooting death of the local sheriff.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Bobby, Reno and Sandy must live together while on a stakeout.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: By returning home to honor the one-year anniversary of his fiancees death, Reno puts himself precariously close to Lt. Dixons deadly clutches.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Renos latest job gets personal - the bounty is on the head of Earl Lyons, an ex-Army Ranger from Renos unit.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 Bounty Hunter Of The Year
programme.desc: Reno, Bobby and Sandy reminisce about the last four years of bounty hunting. Highlight clips from previous episodes are featured.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: The five-year old disappearance of B-movie starlet sends Reno south of the border, following a hot tip from one of Bobbys informants.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno learns he might have a son.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Commissioner Scalis friend and colleague, Chief of Detectives Irv Wallerstein, is struck down.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Cyd suspects her ex-boyfriend of harassment; Tony pursues a mother-son bank-robbing team.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Suffer The Children, Part 2
programme.desc: Tony recovers from an embarrassing accusation to tighten the investigation of Ennis; Rachel struggles with the conflicts of her new job.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: A heart destined for a young girls transplant is stolen; Cyd tracks a larcenous Santa.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Born In The USA
programme.desc: Tony uncovers the shakedown ofa community of illegal immigrants; David wants an earring to impress a girl.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Commissioner Scali and his team of officers pull out all stops as they try to beat the clock in a desperate search for the kidnapper of a very sick baby.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Tony suspects foul play when a member of a commando-like squad of elite prep-school students -- perpetrators of a series of break-in thefts -- disappears.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall follow the trail of revenge and fraud while investigating the murder of a racehorse.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: The Beach Boy arrives in LA and begins to kill drug dealers. Hunter and McCall must figure out his next move.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 The Beautiful and The Dead, Part 1
programme.desc: When a dead girl disappears from Hunters living room, he and McCall follow a trail of intrigue and murder.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall pursue a convicted murderer who is free and has vowed to kill the jurors who convicted him.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: When Hunter investigates a drug ring, his ex-partner becomes a suspect in the murder of the dealers.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter investigates a theft turned murder when a robbery victim hires a detective to retrieve stolen jewels.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Tigers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Siberian tigers are the largest of all cats. Over the last century, theyve experienced an almost total population crash, and at least 97% of those tigers have gone.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Snow Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Often referred to as the gray ghost or ghost of the mountains, this animals rarity and elusiveness was legendary.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Pumas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: These cats are much more closely related to cheetahs than lions. While pumas are often found in mountains, theyre also found in the lowlands, dense forests, or deserts.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Lions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: There are now thought to be fewer than 15,000 lions remaining in Kenyas Masai Mara, a drop of 75% in 50 years.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The leopard is a master of secrecy. Its one of the hardest of all big cats to see, let alone observe. Mainly because leopards need absolute invisibility to hunt.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Jaguars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The first jaguar scientists struggled to go anywhere near their subjects. But times have changed.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Cheetahs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: First, cheetahs are daytime hunters with eyesight optimized for open landscape and distant prey. Second, theyre possibly the fastest land animals that have ever lived.

programme.title: Great White Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: The Bermondsey Horror
programme.desc: In 1849, a man suddenly disappeared in Bermondsey. The discovery that he had been brutally murdered enraptured the press and the public.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of Jack
programme.desc: At the time of Jack The Ripper, London was home to some of the most terrible individuals the city has ever seen. One of the very worst was the elusive Borough Poisoner.

programme.title: Finding Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: Having killed his wife and buried her in the basement, Dr. Crippen believed he had escaped on a ship to Canada. But the police managed to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Brides In The Bath Killer
programme.desc: George Smith had many aliases. He needed them for his many wives who he would soon murder in order to claim the inheritance.

programme.title: Terror In The Roaring Twenties
programme.desc: Edith Thompson and Frederick Bywaters were in love. But the young couple was convicted for murdering her husband in a case that shocked society and fascinated Hitchcock.

programme.title: The Blackout Ripper
programme.desc: It was WWII and London was rocked by the Blitz from the planes flying above. But down on the streets below another terrible danger lurked in the shadows.

programme.desc: Munich, 2013 a giant haul of missing masterpieces were found. Gurlitt was the man behind it. His fathers job was to purchase works for Hitler for the Fuhrermuseum.

programme.title: Faberge Eggs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Each year Carl Faberge made one of a kind Easter egg for the Tsars family. When Carl fled Russia during the revolution, 8 of these priceless Imperial Eggs went missing.

programme.title: Vincent Van Gogh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: When Van Gogh died, he was a complete unknown, his paintings fetching under 10 dollars. So how did his works become some of the most revered and expensive in the world?

programme.title: Monuments Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: During WWII the Nazis plundered some of the worlds greatest artworks as they tore across Europe. We find out how the Allies tracked them down.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The story of the theft of the Mona Lisa in 1911 from the Louvre and how Pablo Picasso was accused of the crime.

programme.title: Vermeer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The Dutch didnt appreciate what they had. For 200 years Vermeer was completely forgotten.

programme.title: Science on Fire
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they kindle our curiosity about the science behind fire. This week’s experiments investigate how you can burn metal using only a 9 volt battery, what fire can teach us about calories, and why a little bit of sodium can cause a gigantic explosion.

programme.title: Invisible Impacts
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they shine a light on the unseen science behind our everyday lives. This week’s experiments explore the resonant frequencies of bridges and human bodies.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.title: Magnificent Mixtures
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Up and Atom
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they break open the atomic bonds that connect our world. This week’s experiments blow open the science behind creating a glowing pickle, how forensic teams extract DNA, and how acids can transform simple household items to their core.

programme.title: Hot Hot Heat
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they turn up the thermostat and discover the role heat plays in science. This week’s experiments investigate how to send secret messages with heat.

programme.title: Explosive Elements
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests discover the unstable world of elemental gasses. This week’s experiments include recreating a big bang with lithium, the incendiary power of methane, and how a little bit of liquified nitrogen can lend a lot of power to a rocket.

programme.title: Colorful Conundrums
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they taste the scientific rainbow. This week’s experiments highlight how electricity can tint titanium, how you can create a color wheel by lighting things on fire, and why the world gets all its colors from white light.

programme.title: Dont Believe Your Eyes
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they make science look like sorcery. This week’s experiments delve into the possibilities of mind control, why objects and people tend to sync together, and the magical mysteries behind magnesium.

programme.title: The Sound of Science
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they tune into the science behind sound. This week’s experiments hit high notes as we discover the physics of theremins, investigate how the outer ear impacts human hearing, and put on a laser show with cymatics.

programme.title: Science on Fire
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they kindle our curiosity about the science behind fire. This week’s experiments investigate how you can burn metal using only a 9 volt battery, what fire can teach us about calories, and why a little bit of sodium can cause a gigantic explosion.

programme.title: Invisible Impacts
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they shine a light on the unseen science behind our everyday lives. This week’s experiments explore the resonant frequencies of bridges and human bodies.

programme.title: Water, Water Everywhere
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they dive deep into the wonderful world of water. In this week’s experiments we discover how water can start a fire, transform breakfast cereal into a magnetic field detector, and even change the way you visualize the world around you.

programme.title: Magnificent Mixtures
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they amalgamate in the name of science. In this week’s experiments we mix up some fireworks made from tin foil, whip up a stinky polymer, and try out an alchemy staple - turning lead into gold.

programme.title: Up and Atom
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they break open the atomic bonds that connect our world. This week’s experiments blow open the science behind creating a glowing pickle, how forensic teams extract DNA, and how acids can transform simple household items to their core.

programme.title: Hot Hot Heat
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they turn up the thermostat and discover the role heat plays in science. This week’s experiments investigate how to send secret messages with heat.

programme.title: Explosive Elements
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests discover the unstable world of elemental gasses. This week’s experiments include recreating a big bang with lithium, the incendiary power of methane, and how a little bit of liquified nitrogen can lend a lot of power to a rocket.

programme.title: Colorful Conundrums
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they taste the scientific rainbow. This week’s experiments highlight how electricity can tint titanium, how you can create a color wheel by lighting things on fire, and why the world gets all its colors from white light.

programme.title: Dont Believe Your Eyes
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they make science look like sorcery. This week’s experiments delve into the possibilities of mind control, why objects and people tend to sync together, and the magical mysteries behind magnesium.

programme.title: The Sound of Science
programme.desc: Join host Nick Uhas and his guests as they tune into the science behind sound. This week’s experiments hit high notes as we discover the physics of theremins, investigate how the outer ear impacts human hearing, and put on a laser show with cymatics.

programme.title: Call Of The Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Childhood curiosity can build a lifelong passion for the natural world. What is special about women’s connection to the wild?

programme.title: Who Tells The Story?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Many of nature’s greatest champions are women. Can their storytelling help restore balance to a troubled world?

programme.title: Climbing The Mountain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Our stories of the wilderness have traditionally been told by white men. But in recent decades pioneering women have overcome obstacles to make their voices heard.

programme.title: One World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Nature Through Her Eyes
programme.desc: Partnerships between men and women, young and old, black and white, give us a fresh appreciation for the creatures we share this earth with.

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: In Katmai National Park, Alaska a massive population of coastal brown bears gather to eat salmon as they migrate back to the rivers and streams where they were born.

programme.title: Fish Like a Bear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: The crew heads inland to a section of the river to observe the many different families as they fish.

programme.title: A Working Ecosystem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: During a lull in bear and salmon activity, Casey and the crew decide to head inland in search of the spawning fish.

programme.title: The Wolf and The Storm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: After seeing a wolf in the distance and tracks on the shore, the crew head inland in search of more clues to the wolfs whereabouts.

programme.title: Neighbors, Old and New
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: Casey and the crew go out in search of the family of the lost cub from the previous night. They hope that if they find them, the cub will have found them as well.

programme.title: No Place Like Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trackers Diary: Bears of Katmai
programme.desc: As the end of their expedition draws near, salmon and bear activity begins to decline, but that doesn’t mean that there aren’t some bears still lingering around the area.

programme.title: Amores Perros
programme.desc: Kauhea auto-onnettomuus yhdistaa kolme tarinaa, joista jokaisessa on mukana hahmoja, jotka kasittelevat menetysta, katumusta ja elaman ankaraa todellisuutta, kaikki rakkauden nimissa.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Rikkinaisessa perheessa kasvanut 17-vuotias Violet (Fanning) unelmoi pop-tahteydesta ja paosta pienesta englantilaisesta kotikylastaan. Toivoa hanelle tuo kansallinen laulukilpailu Teen Spirit ja epatavallinen mentori, joka opettaa hanta laulamaan sydamestaan. Tie menestykseen on kuitenkin taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia. Violetin on voitettava epavarmuutensa uskaltaakseen olla oma itsensa ja paastakseen lopulta loistamaan.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Arkkitehti Leo Watersin avioliitto saroilee. Hanen vaimonsa Julia ei ole onnellinen, ja heidan poikansa Martin jattaa opiskelut kesken ja palaa kotiinsa eksyneena, eika oikein onnistu loytamaan yhteista savelta Leon kanssa. Christinatyttarella on murrosika kaynnissa kaikkine vartalossa ja tunteissa tapahtuvine muutoksineen. Kuvaan astuu Tonya Neely, poliittinen aktivisti joka asuu Leon monta vuotta sitten suunnittelemassa kerrostalossa.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Viimeinen vuoro
programme.desc: Tom Harper (Timothy Spall) lahtee pitkalle bussimatkalle Skotlannin pohjoisimmasta kolkasta synnyinseuduilleen Englannin etelarannikon Lands Endiin. Paikallisbussien aikatauluja, omaa ikaansa ja kohtaloa uhmaten han tekee kaikkensa pitaakseen vaimolleen antamansa lupauksen. Matkasta tulee muistorikas seikkailuretki taynna kaanteita ja yllatyksia. VIIMEINEN VUORO on elokuva rakkaudesta, menetyksesta ja ihmisen luonteikkaasta periksiantamattomuudesta.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: The Room
programme.desc: Kiireisen suurkaupunkielaman vaatimuksiin kyllastyneet Kate ja Matt muuttavat unelmataloonsa maalla. Mutta vanhassa talossa on salaisuutensa, ja pian he loytavat tarkoin katketyn huoneen. Huone, jolla on se upea ominaisuus, etta se pystyy tuomaan esiin ja materialisoimaan kaiken, minka he toivovat. Mutta mikaan onnihan ei ole taydellinen ilman kohtalokkaita seurauksia: huoneeseen ilmestynyt ei voi lahtea huoneesta kuihtumatta pois. Ja Kate ja Matt toivovat kaikkein eniten… lasta.

programme.title: 30:e november
programme.desc: Adam kavereineen kayttaa aikaansa vihaamiensa maahanmuuttajien hairikointiin. Sitten Adam tapaa perulaisen Julian ja he salamarakastuvat. He tapaavat salassa, koska Adamin kaverit tai Julian perhe eivat hyvaksyisi suhdetta. Ruotsin kansallispaivana Adam kavereineen kohtaavat Julian veli Saschan ystavineen. Kohtaaminen johtaa kahden kuolemaan.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: Vuonna 1944, tuhansittain Ita-Euroopan juutalaisia kuolee joukkoteurastuksissa. Vaimonsa kuoleman jalkeen toimimaan havahtunut unkarilainen asianajaja Sonson paatyy johtamaan vastarintaliikkeen aatteellista taistelua kasvavan epatoivon vallassa toimivaa, vaarallista natsiarmeijaa vastaan. Yhdistamalla uskalluksen ja uhkarohkeuden hapeilemattomyyteen, Sonson kaantaa silkan selviytymistaistelun joksikin paljon merkittavammaksi – keinoksi kostaa omiensa kuolema pelastamalla tuhansia muita.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Synchronicity
programme.desc: "Fyysikko Jim Beale on keksinyt aikakoneen, joka mullistaa maailman. Kun vaikutusvaltainen pohatta Klaus Meisner kuulee keksinnosta, han paattaa omia koneen hinnalla milla hyvansa. Jotta keksinto ei joutuisi vaariin kasiin, Jim paattaa matkustaa ajassa taaksepain muuttaakseen asioita. Sundancen elokuvajuhlien lempilapsen Jacob Gentryn elokuva, Synchronicity, on aivonystyroita kutkuttava ‘Scifi Noir’, joka kulkee Blade Runnerin, Gattacan ja Mementon jalanjaljissa."

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Kapteeni Sam Cahill (Maguire) on lahdossa neljannelle komennukselleen, jattaen jalkeensa rakkaan vaimonsa (Portman) ja kaksi tytartaan. Kun Samin Black Hawk –helikopteri ammutaan alas Afganistanin vuoristossa, pahimman oletetaan tapahtuneen, ja perheeseen jaa valtava aukko. Synkasta historiastaan huolimatta Samin karismaattinen pikkuveli Tommy (Gyllenhaal)

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: Vuonna 1944, tuhansittain Ita-Euroopan juutalaisia kuolee joukkoteurastuksissa. Vaimonsa kuoleman jalkeen toimimaan havahtunut unkarilainen asianajaja Sonson paatyy johtamaan vastarintaliikkeen aatteellista taistelua kasvavan epatoivon vallassa toimivaa, vaarallista natsiarmeijaa vastaan. Yhdistamalla uskalluksen ja uhkarohkeuden hapeilemattomyyteen, Sonson kaantaa silkan selviytymistaistelun joksikin paljon merkittavammaksi – keinoksi kostaa omiensa kuolema pelastamalla tuhansia muita.

programme.title: Bekas
programme.desc: 1990-luvun alussa, Saddam Husseinin hallinto painostaa Irakin kurdialuetta. Kaksi koditonta kurdipoikaanakee Terasmiehen kaupungin ensimmaisessa elokuvateatterissa ja paattaa lahtea Amerikkaan.Paastaakseen sinne he tarvitsevat passit, rahaa ja paljon onnea. Vaikka heilla ei ole mitaan naista, healoittavat silti matkan, joka vie heita kohti unelmaa Amerikasta.Elokuva on Karzan Kaderin esikoisohjaus ja kahden veljeksen rooleissa nahdaan Sarwar Fazil ja Zamand Taha.

programme.title: The Honor List
programme.desc: Kolme entista bestista tapaavat jalleen, kun ryhman neljas jasen kuolee yllattaen high schoolin viimeisella luokalla. He paattavat suorittaa veivilistan, jonka he tekivat fuksivuonna ollessaan viela laheisia.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade johtaa kapinallisia taistelussa Seefra-5:n sotapaallikkoa vastaan.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan saa selville, etta Bekan poikaystava oli oikeasti Drago Musevini, ja han kaytti Bekan DNA:ta luodakseen nietzschelaiset.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka ja Rhade joutuvat koetukselle, joka joko antaa heille suuren rikkauden tai ajaa heidat hulluuteen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper loytaa ohjelman, joka voi tuhota kahdeksan Seefra-planeettaa ja tappaa miljoonia ihmisia.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Samalla kun Harper yrittaa pelastaa Seefra-jarjestelman, vakooja hiipii Andromedalle ja hyokkaa Bekan kimppuun.

programme.desc: Kun Dylan loukkaantuu vakavasti laboratoriossa tapahtuneessa rajahdyksessa, han matkustaa erilaisten vaihtoehtoisten todellisuuksien lapi.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police were puzzled by an obscure print found at a crime scene where one man had been killed and two teenage girls were seriously injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendants brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A computer crash pushed a manufacturing company to the brink of collapse. Investigators must determine if the crash was the result of a sabotage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At a murder scene, investigators find a shoe-print, several foreign hairs, and unknown fingerprints. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Rosemary Anderson is found dead on the side of the road, her boyfriend becomes the prime suspect. He eventually confessed to her murder, but so did another man - serial killer, Eric Edgar Cooke.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After 6-year-old Michelle Lee Dorr went missing, her father confessed to murdering her. But investigators soon poked holes in his story, leaving the case unsolved for 14 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a ravine, but crucial crime scene evidence had been washed away by severe thunderstorms. Almost 20 years later, an old hat brought the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fire erupted in Kings Cross Station, killing 31 people and injuring dozens more. Investigators pinpointed the cause of the fire with state-of-the-art technology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A coroner finds telltale clues on the badly burned body of a murder victim, sending police in pursuit of a couple of killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Haunted by the disappearance of her mother, a young woman undertakes an investigation of her own. In her mothers diary, she discovers a dark family secret that might explain the disappearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The police investigate when a severed leg is discovered among garbage. Conventional means of identifying the victim are impossible, leading investigators to rely on DNA, forensic anthropology and toxicology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A neighbor watched as a man stabbed his wife, pushed her into the swimming pool and held her head under water.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two people witness a truck driving over an unconscious man and flee into a nearby bar, but when the police turn up, the truck, the man and the witnesses are gone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the mail-order bride of a former army sergeant goes missing, investigators look into the deaths of the mans previous two wives.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On the way to Yosemite National Park, a car carrying three Secret Service agents collided with another car.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Exploring how an American hit single from 1966 -- "The Cheater" by Bob Kuban and the In-Men -- foreshadowed the demise of the groups lead singer, Walter Scott.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A high school gym teacher gives his friend a ride home but never returns; his wife and friend receive letters saying he started a new life, but they suspect foul play despite no body being discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A police officer accused of killing his estranged wife insists she committed suicide. Investigators say it was murder - that it was physically impossible for the woman to have shot herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A union official is executed in his home not long after a strike by the union membership. Neither his wife nor anyone in the neighborhood heard any gunshots.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two men called police to report the same murder. The investigation uncovered more unusual circumstances.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of 16-year-old Leanne Tiernan was discovered nine months after she disappeared. Forensic scientists found clues that painted a virtual portrait of her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of Katie Poirier is stymied by the lack of a body. Finally, investigators use a single tooth found among some charred remains to identify her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A car carrying three men pulls up alongside another on an Alaskan highway and fires shots, leaving a passenger dead. One of the passengers in the killers car agrees to testify against his friends. The resulting trials dont end the carnage.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Residents of Noel, Missouri were stunned to learn that their bank had been robbed and the bank president was missing. His body was later found floating in a lake, securely bound to a chair with duct tape.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man disappears one year to the day after beginning an affair with his friends wife. 15 years later, with the help of a metal detector, police find evidence that would prove what had happened and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths proved to be serial murders. The killer used poison which had no taste.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a street fight takes the life of a national wrestling champion, police must determine if he was killed in cold blood or in self-defense.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A go-go dancer told her family she needed to get away for a while and then she simply disappeared. Investigators were suspicious, because she took neither her car nor her clothes. 20 years later, her family received a call that changed everything.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the state of Florida was known for more than just Disney World. Worldwide attention focused on a rash of robberies which targeted tourists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teen was killed by her parents in what they said was self-defense, but forensic evidence told otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young TV news producer is raped and murdered in her apartment. Investigators turn to the Commonwealth of Virginias DNA Databank.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police led an intense search and relied on forensics when the mother of two young children went missing.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bombings are difficult to solve, because the perpetrator isnt usually at the scene, and the evidence goes up in smoke. In this case pieces of plastic the size of grains of sand hold the key to a mans murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A cop is found dead. His wife first says the motive was robbery; then she tells police it was suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bruce Miller was shot to death in the office of a junkyard business. When a computer forensics expert examined the computers owned by the victims wife, he found all the evidence needed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man died in his home after a history of heart disease. Rumors surfaced that the death was no accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: No one in a residential community saw anything the day one of their neighbors was brutally murdered. Fingerprints found at the crime scene helped investigators to apprehend the presumed killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the summer of 1986, Kathleen Lipscombs body was found on a deserted road outside of San Antonio. Months passed, then years, and the crime was never solved.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero - until the captains body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a victim is brutally murdered in his bed, investigators find a shoe impression in the mud outside.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Chris Ochoa confessed to the 1988 rape and murder of Nancy DePriest, the case was closed. 8 years later, Achim Marino confessed to the same crime. Can DNA evidence identify the real perpetrator?

programme.title: Forensic Files
