programme.title: So Near, So Far
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Inside Moto S1 - "So Near, So Far"
programme.desc: We reveal how Maverick and Alvaro face the loneliness of being Champions: Maverick lets go of family support while for Alvaro Bautista, family is the key.

programme.title: The Pagoda
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Geared Up S1 - "The Pagoda"
programme.desc: The team does a restoration modification of a 1964 Mercedes Benz 230 SL, adding custom made wheels and a modern engine.

programme.title: The Blazer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Geared Up S1 - "The Blazer"
programme.desc: A 1970 K5 Chevrolet Blazer undergoes a transformation with new paint, interior, and a diesel engine conversion.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "The Outsider"
programme.desc: Wayland Campbell and Levi Shirley go head to head leading to the championship but there is an outsider Randy Slawson, 2 time champion to never under-estimate.

programme.title: The Showdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "The Showdown"
programme.desc: Leaders Wayland Campbell and Levi Shirley push each other to their limits while other top drivers show just how fast 4x4 off road racing has become.

programme.title: Luke Woodham v Adam Elder
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Luke Woodham v Adam Elder"
programme.desc: 3-time rear wheel drive Gymkhana Grid champion Luke Woodham is defending for a fourth title. His biggest rival Adam Elder is doing everything he can to win.

programme.title: Great 8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Great 8"
programme.desc: Road to Gymkhana Grid: 100% pure adrenalin! Profiling 8 of the sport’s top drivers, we see into their minds and the mental preparation needed to compete.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 2"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel takes on the final records attempts, and the shocking results leave everyone reeling.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Crash"
programme.desc: After driver Jon Webster crashes the Flying Kestrel at 148 mph, the team must work out what went wrong and have to decide if the dream of a land speed record is worth risking it all?

programme.title: Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Ahmad Al Harthy - Aston Martin Vantage"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Ahmad Al Harthy competing in the Aston Martin Vantage at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: 1963 Corvette Z06
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "1963 Corvette Z06"
programme.desc: The team at Muscle Cars of Texas will add primer to the frame of a half million dollar 1963 Corvette Z06. This 65 Mustang had a tune up and its ready for a test drive. A new costumer has dropped off a 1968 Corvette for a restoration project.

programme.title: 59 Ford Pickup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "59 Ford Pickup"
programme.desc: This time, on Muscle Cars of Texas, Vinnie and the team are working on a 63 Z06, 59 Ford Pickup and a 69 Chevy Malibu.

programme.title: 69 Chevy Malibu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "69 Chevy Malibu"
programme.desc: Vinnie and team at Muscle Cars of Texas go under the hood of the 69 Malibu. The 63 Z06 factory race car, you have to see what it takes to make this race car look like it came out of the factory. Tagging and bagging time on the 72 Corvette.

programme.title: Barrett Jackson 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "Barrett Jackson 2024"
programme.desc: Vinnie is in Scottsdale Arizona for Barrett Jackson 2024. There is so much happening, from checking out awesome vendors, looking at awesome classic cars, and even trying amazing food.

programme.title: Firepower Operation
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Firepower Operation"
programme.desc: Its nearing the end of Operation Firepower. The ghouls are working hard to complete the project and tries to fire up the Cuda for the first time.

programme.title: Disneyland of Carz
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 Graveyard Carz S7 - "Disneyland of Carz"
programme.desc: At SEMA, the Ghouls make their rounds in the Disneyland of cars. The team goes drifting and Mark takes to the stage to reveal Operation Firepower to the world.

programme.title: The Phantom ‘Cuda Rides Again
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 Graveyard Carz S7 - "The Phantom ‘Cuda Rides Again"
programme.desc: The legendary 1971 440 six-barrel, Phantom Cuda is revealed to its owner. Dont miss the final send-off for the Cuda that started Graveyard Carz.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

programme.title: Episode Four
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Four"
programme.desc: Nik tests the 2021 Toyota Land Cruiser. Mike explores the 2021 Kia Telluride. Nik showcases the 2021 Hyundai N Line. Witness Mercedes Benz AMGs pinnacle creation. Niks blown away by the new Kia K5.

programme.title: Episode Five
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Five"
programme.desc: Nik showcases Mercedes-Benzs screen innovation. Mike loves the 2021 Kia Seltos. They both enjoy driving cool cars like the 2021 Corvette Stingray. Nik praises the 2021 Toyota Venza Hybrid.

programme.title: Episode Six
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Six"
programme.desc: Nik explores Range Rovers history, tests the 2021 Volvo XC90 ReCharge hybrid, and rides the 2021 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Red Eye with Mike. Hes wowed by the 2021 BMW 745e.

programme.title: Long Beach California
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Close Proximity S1 - "Long Beach California"
programme.desc: Matt Field and his and his solid team of experts head down to Long Beach, California to begin the Formula Drift Championship series.

programme.title: Atlanta
programme.desc: Coming off a good start to the Formula Drift Tour, Matt Field and his crew prep, pack, and fly to Atlanta for next stop of the Formula Drift championship.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dangers of Dark Fest S2 - "Episode 1"
programme.desc: The fourth edition of Dark Fest gets underway. The first episode focuses on how the event was organized and experienced by the riders and audience.

programme.title: The Rebuild
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Rebuild"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel team regroup at Jon’s workshop as he shows them his new groundbreaking ideas to rebuild the car to give them the best chance at breaking a land speed record.

programme.title: Albert Costa - Lexus RC F
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "Albert Costa - Lexus RC F"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know Alberto Costa competing in the Lexus RC F at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: 69 Chevy Malibu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "69 Chevy Malibu"
programme.desc: Vinnie and team at Muscle Cars of Texas go under the hood of the 69 Malibu. The 63 Z06 factory race car, you have to see what it takes to make this race car look like it came out of the factory. Tagging and bagging time on the 72 Corvette.

programme.title: Barrett Jackson 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Muscle Cars of Texas S1 - "Barrett Jackson 2024"
programme.desc: Vinnie is in Scottsdale Arizona for Barrett Jackson 2024. There is so much happening, from checking out awesome vendors, looking at awesome classic cars, and even trying amazing food.

programme.title: Shelly
programme.desc: A neglected 1981 Porsche 911 SC is brought back to life and restored to its original factory specifications.

programme.title: Cabriolet
programme.desc: A ruined and rested family heirloom 1962 Mercedes Benz 220 SE Cabriolet gets a restoration modification with a new Mercedes engine and a new interior with heated seats.

programme.title: The 3.5
programme.desc: A rare 1971 Mercedes Benz 280 SE 3.5 Coupe gets restored to its original specifications.

programme.title: Finding Nirvana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "Finding Nirvana"
programme.desc: How does a rider feel moments before the race that they have spent their life preparing for? Franco Morbidelli begins his first MOTOGP race weekend in Qatar.

programme.title: Chasing Happy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "Chasing Happy"
programme.desc: The VR46 MotoRanch track created by Valentino Rossi as a place to fine tune the riding skills of a lucky few, is notoriously hard to access - until now.

programme.title: A Dangerous Game
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "A Dangerous Game"
programme.desc: There’s danger on the track at the years biggest race, Mugello. Franco battles to focus on his goal of ‘Rookie of the Year’ while around him his team implodes.

programme.title: Taking Home the Bronze
programme.sub-title: S11 : E01 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Taking Home the Bronze"
programme.desc: See the beautiful Turbine-Bonze Metallic 1968 Charger meticulously resurrected and revealed to its proud owner.

programme.title: Hellephant in the Room
programme.sub-title: S11 : E02 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Hellephant in the Room"
programme.desc: At SEMA 2018, Mark was gifted the first third-generation 426 Hemi-Crate engine by Mopar, and now must decide which car he’s going to install it in for SEMA 2019. Meanwhile, Will begins paint-prep on a beautiful Rallye Red 1970 Plymouth ‘Cuda.

programme.title: Rallye the Troops
programme.sub-title: S11 : E03 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Rallye the Troops"
programme.desc: Mark leaves Will in charge of the shop while working on his super-secret SEMA 2019 build. This leaves George and Dougie to begin the final assembly to the 1970 B7 Challenger. In the body shop, a 1970 Cuda is prepped for its first-coat of Rallye Red.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: As the fog passes on the peak of Fish Hooks rocky face, the outline of the crew appears exactly where the ram was bedded last. Did they shoot and Chris not hear the shot?

programme.title: Saddles Sores
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Saddles Sores"
programme.desc: Leaving sheep country on a high, the men face a daunting 22-hour trail ride to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp. Two days of riding loom a head before reaching their destination. However, trouble strikes just eight hours into the journey.

programme.title: Into The High Lonesome
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Trail S1 - "Into The High Lonesome"
programme.desc: Modern day Mountain Man Laramy Miller sets out on the trail to experience life in the high lonesome.

programme.title: Camp Otis
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Trail S1 - "Camp Otis"
programme.desc: Life at Camp Otis. Laramy finds success fishing and foraging, and spends his time taking care of 7 and doing camp chores.

programme.title: Cloudy Days
programme.desc: On day two of the hunting season, Chris and Kaid explore downstream for a better location and fish. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. savor salmon for protein. Alaska is pounded by massive storm clouds.

programme.title: Soaked Spirits
programme.desc: R.L. opens up to Casey about the trials that led him to realize the importance of Be Alive. Chris and Kaid are holed up in the tent at the mercy of the Alaskan weather. Casey and R.L. find some food.

programme.title: Chamois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Chamois"
programme.desc: This story is about the mountain, unspoiled nature, the hunt for silence, and some very agile goats.

programme.title: Become NatureWise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Urban Huntsman S1 - "Become NatureWise"
programme.desc: The organizations mission is to develop childrens nature identity and understanding of nature by disseminating nature, hunting, and angling, plus cooking from nature pantries of plants, fish, and wild game.

programme.title: The Backcast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "The Backcast"
programme.desc: The group of anglers continue their weekend of fishing out of El Pescador Lodge and the Belize River Lodge. ~Tom McGuane experiences a memorable fight with a giat tarpon and we join up with angling legend Stu Apte in Florida.

programme.title: Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 The New Fly Fisher S16 - "Fish Tales Fly Shop (Calgary Alberta)"
programme.desc: Jenna McKeown visits Calgary Alberta to fish the Bow River. This is one of the few rivers in the world that runs through a major city yet has excellent fishing.

programme.title: Wardens Instinct
programme.desc: There is often a fine line between false information and the truth. Veteran Region 5 wardens use their sixth to bring game violators to justice.

programme.title: Fourth Dimension
programme.desc: Fourth of July in Montana – Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Behind The Shed
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Wardens S5 - "Behind The Shed"
programme.desc: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

programme.title: Church on the Mountain
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Church on the Mountain"
programme.desc: In the Yukon, decisions are pivotal and amplified in its rugged terrain. The brothers close in on a giant grizzly, now within 500 yards, with the decision lying in Chriss hands.

programme.title: Relocation
programme.desc: Laramy realizes that game is scarce because of the wolves and he decides to put some distance between himself and the pack. Time to break down camp and move to a new location.

programme.title: Arluk Outfitters
programme.sub-title: S17 : E02 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Arluk Outfitters"
programme.desc: We re-visit the famed Main River in Northern Newfoundland to fly fish for wild Atlantic Salmon.

programme.title: Carolyn Beach Motel
programme.sub-title: S17 : E03 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Carolyn Beach Motel"
programme.desc: Alyx Parks and Colin McKeown are on a DIY early season smallmouth bass trip to located big pre-spawn bass!

programme.title: Cree River Lodge
programme.sub-title: S17 : E05 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Cree River Lodge"
programme.desc: Jenna and Alyx visit northern Saskatchewan to catch giant pike and walleye on a fly. While there, they catch a new IGFA record fish!

programme.title: Clarion River
programme.sub-title: S17 : E06 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Clarion River"
programme.desc: Rob Heal visits the beautiful PAGO region of Pennsylvania and fishes the Clarion River for both Brown Trout and Smallmouth Bass.

programme.title: EUROPEAN POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Police Patrol S1 - "EUROPEAN POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In the multicultural hubs of Paris and London, tensions can run high. It’s up to the police to bridge differences and keep the peace—working daily to protect some of Europe’s busiest capitals.

programme.title: WOMEN POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Police Patrol S1 - "WOMEN POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, India, wealth and poverty coexist side by side. Each day, 15,000 officers battle crime ranging from theft to interreligious violence. In Palestine, 8,500 police face an even tougher challenge—working across a fragmented, politically tense landscape where every patrol carries risk.

programme.title: MEDITERRANEAN - HARBOUR POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Police Patrol S1 - "MEDITERRANEAN - HARBOUR POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Catalonia, the regional police have taken over from Spain’s national force, deploying a rapid-response motorcycle unit to tackle urban crime. Meanwhile in Haifa, Israel’s main port city, police operate under strict laws in a tense environment shaped by terrorism threats and ongoing regional conflict.

programme.title: LOST!
programme.desc: Nick and Laura head deep into the mountains to explore survival techniques that go far beyond anything they’ve learned before. Our courageous hosts subject themselves to intense survival training with the Survival Training School of California.

programme.title: ATV Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Survival Science S1 - "ATV Accidents"
programme.desc: ATVs have allowed us to penetrate the wilderness like never before. But they’ve also made the backcountry a bit more dangerous. Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests to see how accidents happen and what you can do to protect yourself.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: Ibiza’s medical services face heavy strain during tourist season, often due to late-night excesses. In Thailand, nurses work tirelessly at the Full Moon Party to keep international revelers safe.

programme.title: Carnival
programme.desc: Rio’s Carnival—a week of samba and celebrations—often sends many to the ER. At Barcelona’s La Mercè Festival, first aid stations care for the injured, sick, and intoxicated.

programme.title: Fun in The Sun
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 Wardens S5 - "Fun in The Sun"
programme.desc: When Jet skies get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 Wardens S5 - "Above and Beyond"
programme.desc: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: In 2012 The small community of Whitefish Montana was shocked by the useless killing of over 20 deer. Region 1 Wardens think outside the box to put a stop to this heinous crime.

programme.title: Valley of Snow
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Valley of Snow"
programme.desc: Snow relentlessly pounds the Keefer brothers at Church Camp, reducing visibility to an all-time low. Theyre snowed in with timetable to resume the hunt, as many problems start to surface.

programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Cree River Lodge
programme.sub-title: S17 : E05 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Cree River Lodge"
programme.desc: Jenna and Alyx visit northern Saskatchewan to catch giant pike and walleye on a fly. While there, they catch a new IGFA record fish!

programme.title: Clarion River
programme.sub-title: S17 : E06 The New Fly Fisher S17 - "Clarion River"
programme.desc: Rob Heal visits the beautiful PAGO region of Pennsylvania and fishes the Clarion River for both Brown Trout and Smallmouth Bass.

programme.title: The Lateral Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "The Lateral Line"
programme.desc: Old friends Michael Keaton and Tom McGuane share a boat together, which means there will be plenty of action and plenty of laughts. Bonefish and Tarpon Trusts Aaron Adams helps Zach Gilford dance with a tarpon for the first time.

programme.title: Rising Tides
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Rising Tides"
programme.desc: Off the coast of Belize, the group of anglers continue their pursuit of bonefish and tarpon. Michael Keaton and Zach Gilford chase tarpon, while Bill Klyn and Yvon Chouinard are after bone. We also share a boat with Aaron Adams and Tom McGuane.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "Fighting Fish"
programme.desc: Angling experts Lori-Ann Murphy and Aaron Adams prove that catching a tarpon is no easy feat as they try to land a silver king in the Florida Keys. Dr. Jerry Ault discusses the research underway as scientists try to unravel the mysteries of these fish.

programme.title: Meet Island Air
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Meet Island Air"
programme.desc: Veteran bush pilot Bob Stanford risks everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Fight or Flight"
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep control of the craft and keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Deadmans Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S1 - "Deadmans Survival"
programme.desc: Island Air battles time and elements, to rescue a group trapped in Deadmans Bay.

programme.title: Day One Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day One Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Day one begins as the four 2-man teams blast off from Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West with nine different cameras rolling on all the action including helicopter and underwater cameras.

programme.title: Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 Dropped S8 - "Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes"
programme.desc: A look at life behind the lens from the men that make it happen.

programme.title: The Best of Dropped
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 Dropped S8 - "The Best of Dropped"
programme.desc: Relive all your favorite moments from Dropped Seasons.

programme.title: Invasive Species
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP. But when AIS check stations are set up in Region 1 and 3 its up to the Wardens to educate the public.

programme.title: Axel and Chains
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Wardens S5 - "Axel and Chains"
programme.desc: When Wardens respond to a call sometimes getting there is most of the battle. And we pay tribute to an honorary warden that will truly be missed.

programme.title: End of the Line
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "End of the Line"
programme.desc: As the bull responds to the calls, Chris hears but cant see it, while Casey can. Their attempts to communicate via signals falter as the bull vanishes over the mountains peak, out of sight.

programme.title: Panna: Land of the Dhole
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Journeys in India S2 - "Panna: Land of the Dhole"
programme.desc: Over the years, Bill has been able to find and film all of the great predators of India, but one—the wild Asiatic Dog or Dhole. These illusive and endangered canines have rarely been captured on camera.

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: The Animals of Oudtshoorn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Animals of Oudtshoorn"
programme.desc: Xander starts his day by receiving a surprising phone call from Adam before heading to Chandelier Game Lodge to visit Africa’s most exquisite animals.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Weekend Breaks with Gregg Wallace S1 - "Amsterdam"
programme.desc: Gregg heads to the Dutch capital for a long weekend where he tries out amazing food and drink, gets involved with fascinating local customs, explores life on the canals and uncovers the historical reasons Amsterdam has such a relaxed attitude.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Ibiza"
programme.desc: Three artists head to Ibiza to face their street art challenge; bringing the local community together through art. But the Mediterranean sun is unforgiving.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Two street artists team up in downtown Hong Kong to hear their street art challenge; create awareness for the citys fast growing food waste problem.

programme.title: Luxor, Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Luxor, Egypt"
programme.desc: The brothers chosen form of transport in Egypt is a Felucca Boat…the ancient trading vessel of transport. They travel north along the Nile, from the oasis town of Aswan to the ancient city of Luxor, before finding a massive sand dune to slide down.

programme.title: Ashiques Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Ashiques Italy"
programme.desc: Ashique surprises the team with Vespa rides along the coast, adapts plans with an aquarium visit, and arranges a Fiat 500 countryside drive. The day ends with relaxation at a Roman spa.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Inside Ferrari"
programme.desc: The trio are joined by Mathias Lauda, son of F1 Legend Niki Lauda, at Ferrari’s Maranello HQ. From factory tours showcasing Ferrari’s craftsmanship to dining in Ferrari’s historic restaurant, the team immerses in Ferrari’s legacy.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car and Country Quest S1 - "Inside Ferrari 2"
programme.desc: Freddie leads an exclusive Ferrari tour, as they explore Ferrari’s design centre, visit its museum, and honour F1 champions. A friendly race in the Ferrari simulator and a scenic drive in new Ferraris close their Italian adventure beautifully.

programme.title: Thailands Crazy Capital
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Thailands Crazy Capital"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris explores Thailand’s crazy capital, goes on a mission to swim with the worlds largest shark and finds an island paradise where beaches are just the beginning.

programme.title: Abu Dhabi and Remote Outback Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Abu Dhabi and Remote Outback Australia"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris visits some pets of a different kind in Abu Dhabi, journeys to remote outback Australia for a singing lesson and finds an Australian city experience that rivals the Big Apple.

programme.title: Australia and Cook Islands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Australia and Cook Islands"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris goes in search of wild Orcas in Canada, Journeys to Australia’s biggest rock, finds out what it takes to blend in like a local in the Cook Islands and visits a waterfall of a different kind.

programme.title: KINGFISH + DEER HUNTING
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "KINGFISH + DEER HUNTING"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri goes deep sea fishing in Tokomaru Bay. Plus a father and son duo take Piri deer stalking.

programme.title: Dannevirke / Norsewood
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Dannevirke / Norsewood"
programme.desc: Piri is in Manawatu in search of kina and paua. He goes rabbit shooting with the local “Ruahine Hunter” in Norsewood.

programme.title: Hokianga
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Hokianga"
programme.desc: Piri goes fishing for Snapper in Mitimiti, and has a go at drag-netting flounder in Whirinaki.

programme.title: Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Trails S1 - "Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes heli hiking and caving while exploring Canada’s first and most popular National Park and neighboring Lake Louise.

programme.title: Australia’s Northern Territory
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Trails S1 - "Australia’s Northern Territory"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under to explore the Larapinta Trail and Kakadu National Park.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.title: Paris and Barcelona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Paris and Barcelona"
programme.desc: Bones introduce his trademark trickery to people in Paris and Barcelona, performing mind reading and an attempt to escape a straitjacket while breakdancing.

programme.title: London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "London"
programme.desc: In this episode Bones is back in his home city, London where he stuns locals with his mind reading, card trickery and disappearing skills.

programme.title: South Korea - Night
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "South Korea - Night"
programme.desc: Bones is in Seoul, South Korea. He explores the city by night and performs a mixture of magic tricks, including a vanishing trick, coin tricks and card tricks.

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Crater
programme.desc: Rob and Dave continue their journey to Salta, but before they go anywhere near the glorious wine capital they make a detour the Cerro Blanco, a large volcano.

programme.title: Stunning Scenario
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Roads End S1 - "Stunning Scenario"
programme.desc: A day of gruelling grape picking lies ahead and the duo discover a new love for the country’s greatest export.

programme.title: Lisbon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Running the World S1 - "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave undertake a run where they attempt to escape from Lisbon castle without using any conventional exit routes.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Running the World S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave head to Delhi India to complete a treacherous final run challenge.

programme.title: Mexico City
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Running the World S1 - "Mexico City"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave race through an 18th century monastery on the outskirts of Mexico City and whoever rings the bell in the tower first wins.

programme.title: Chile, Australia and Kenya
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Chile, Australia and Kenya"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris takes to the streets in the Chilean capital, finds the ultimate island paradise in Australia and pushes himself to the limit in a Kenyan Marathon.

programme.title: Thailand and Australias Best Secret Beach
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Thailand and Australias Best Secret Beach"
programme.desc: In this episode of Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris discovers a holiday with a difference in Thailand, reveals Australia’s best secret beach and finds a city that’s stuck in a time warp.

programme.title: Japan and Australia... for dogs!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Travels with the Bondi Vet S1 - "Japan and Australia... for dogs!"
programme.desc: This week on Travels with the Bondi Vet, Chris takes part in Japan’s quirkiest festival and road tests Australia’s best holiday... for dogs. Chris embarks on an Aussie outback experience with a bird’s eye view of one of Australia’s most breathtaking sights!

programme.title: Gisborne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Gisborne"
programme.desc: Piri dives for Kina in Gisborne, and faces his fear of stingrays. Plus, he goes on a voyage on waka Tairawhiti, then visits Te Poho o Rawiri Marae.

programme.title: Manawatu / Whanganui
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Manawatu / Whanganui"
programme.desc: Piri goes in search of the illusive Samba deer near Marton. Plus a journey up the Whanganui River sees him chasing wild pigs.

programme.title: Whangarei
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Whangarei"
programme.desc: Piri tries his hand at snapper fishing from a kayak, goes scallop diving and attempts to out run a National Waka Ama champion.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Epic Trails S1 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the world-renowned Abel Tasman National Park by foot, and by sea kayak.

programme.title: Peru
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the amazing culture, hikes, and ruins of Peru’s Sacred Valley.

programme.title: Winter in Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Epic Trails S1 - "Winter in Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson returns to Banff National Park and Lake Louise in the snowy months to explore the backcountry by snowshoe and snowboard.

programme.title: South Korea - Traditional
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "South Korea - Traditional"
programme.desc: In this episode Bones is in South Korea, where he visits Taekwondo group, the K Tigers, a tarot card reader and reveals the secret to the perfect card shuffle.

programme.title: South Korea - Youth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "South Korea - Youth"
programme.desc: This time Magical Bones is in Seoul. He goes to the B-Boy championships and also visits his friend Ji and performs a spectacular trick on a shirt.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: In this episode Pete take to the streets of India’s capital city Delhi. He performs a series of fun and baffling tricks including a levitation attempt.

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Abisko, Swedish Lapland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Abisko, Swedish Lapland"
programme.desc: Lapland is a frozen, winterland of reindeer, Sami people and saunas. The brothers start in Stockholm and fly 200 kilometers straight north above the Arctic Circle. Their chosen mode of transport for this journey is a reindeer sleigh.

programme.title: Cape Town
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Simple Path S1 - "Cape Town"
programme.desc: Cape Town South Africa is about vintage cameras, fish and chips with seals, botany inspired apparel, The Dollfins, a hand poke tattoo, forest foraged mushrooms and drag queens skating a barrier on Table mountain.

programme.title: Johannesburg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 A Simple Path S1 - "Johannesburg"
programme.desc: Empowered in Jozi the city of gold South Africa with the kids from Skateistan, leftfield artists and photographers, streetside Kotas, volcano sessions, Slappy screen printing, a backyard ramp and skating through an art gallery.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi is in a strip of islands in the middle of nowhere - French Polynesia! He scours the island of Bora Bora in search of a real local’s meal but goes empty handed. Switching gears, he looks for respite at the legendary Four Seasons Bora Bora where he embarks on a deep-sea fishing run with local fishermen, catching yellowtail tuna.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 2"
programme.desc: With luxury done and dusted, Sashi comes across a story of resurgence during a pandemic, with the story of St. James, one of the island’s newest restaurants. Feeling like he did Bora Bora justice, Sashi island hops over to Mo’orea where he takes the quirkiest food tour of his life; baguettes with chow mein, ice-cream pizza, Chinese dumplings!? The island of Mo’orea does quirky food right!

programme.title: Alaska
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Alaska"
programme.desc: Denella visits Anchorage, Alaska, where its a bit urban and wild.

programme.title: Disney Cruise Line
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Disney Cruise Line"
programme.desc: Sail away with Denella on board the Disney Dream. Who says Disney Cruise Line is just for kids?

programme.title: Agents of Million Dollar Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Agents of Million Dollar Homes"
programme.desc: Deborah and Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, and Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams.

programme.title: Glass House (Part 1)
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent S2 - "Glass House (Part 1)"
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor.

programme.title: Coconut

programme.desc: Explore the boundless potential of coconuts with Lauren as she reinvents a calamari dish using coconut flesh, offering a taste experience that will leave you in awe and redefine your culinary perceptions.

programme.title: Banana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Banana"
programme.desc: Indulge in the versatile world of bananas as Lauren skillfully crafts recipes, from banana flour sourdough bread to twist-infused pancakes, offering a tantalizing experience that showcases the endless possibilities of this humble fruit.

programme.title: Seattle / Vancouver
programme.desc: After a surprese invite to visit the head of accessibility at Microsofts headquarters in Seattle, James heads to Vancouver, Canadas jewel of the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: New York City
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Blindspots S1 - "New York City"
programme.desc: How does the bustling island of steel and stone fare for those with disabilities? James sets out to discover what its like to travel blind in the Big Apple.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: St. Petersburg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Street Art Challenge S1 - "St. Petersburg"
programme.desc: English and South American street artists pair up to take on an epic challenge in the worlds biggest country, Russia. The men have to finish a complete circus.

programme.title: Athens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Athens"
programme.desc: Two American street artists try to turn a school into a piece of art. Seems impossible, but this duo turns out to be a real American Dream Team.

programme.title: Bangalore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Bangalore"
programme.desc: Two worlds collide in one of the busiest cities in the world when Mexico’s most famous street artist is meeting his equivalent on their home turf in India.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx journeys Berlin, one of the worlds undisputed techno capitals, and discovers the sound of freedom buried in its history.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: DJ-producer Carly Foxx travels to the clubbing capital of the world to inspire her music track and discovers Ibiza’s alternative spiritual side.

programme.title: Europe
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx looks back at her journey to the music dance capitals of Europe to inspire her final track.

programme.title: Estonia / Vietnam
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Exploring S1 - "Estonia / Vietnam"
programme.desc: In this episode, Josh travels to Tallinn in Estonia with urban explorer Steve Duncan where they explore Patarei Prison. Meanwhile, Cody is in Vietnam with his friend Sherman Mak and travels to Pan Thiet in search of abandoned amusement park Soui Cat.

programme.title: Germany / Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Exploring S1 - "Germany / Morocco"
programme.desc: This time urban explorers Josh and Cody separately visit Germany and Morocco in search of astonishing abandoned locations including Wunsdorf, the forbidden city near Berlin, and an abandoned filmset in the Sahara desert used for Game of Thrones.

programme.title: Georgia / France
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Epic Exploring S1 - "Georgia / France"
programme.desc: Josh and Cody are separately visiting Georgia and France. Cody, together with rooftopper Harry Gallagher, undertakes a cable car trip known as Stalin’s coffin. Josh is in France searching for abandoned chateaus with globetrotter Lexie Limitless.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.desc: James returns to his former home city of Los Angeles, where he reconnects with old friends working in accessibility in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: The Rise of Pabu-chan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Rhys Darby in Japan S1 - "The Rise of Pabu-chan"
programme.desc: The popularity of New Zealands mascot, Pabu-chan, grows at the Sapporo Snow Festival, and then he gets a chance to hit the big time. Rhys also travels to the Okinawa Islands in search of the beautiful and fleeting cherry blossoms.

programme.title: Mexico
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Mexico"
programme.desc: Jonathan begins his theme of exploration on all things the Spanish Conquistadores could not suppress.From the ancient bitter drink of Chocolatl, to the world’s fastest growing religion, Santa Muerte. Between delicious foods at taco stands to exploring bustling markets in Mexico City.

programme.title: Desert Dunes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Roads Unknown India S1 - "Desert Dunes"
programme.desc: Jess and the team arrive in Mumbai, soaking in the city’s vibrant culture. After saying goodbye to Pulak, the team scrambles to catch their trains to Ahmedabad and Jodhpur. Split up along the way, they reunite in Jaisalmer where they experience quintessential Rajasthan, riding across the iconic dunes of the Thar Desert.

programme.title: The Unforgettable Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Roads Unknown India S1 - "The Unforgettable Journey"
programme.desc: Jess explores the ancient towns and iconic landmarks of Rajasthan. The crew continues to Jaipur, uncovering more cultural treasures and reunites with Pulak for the final stretch to Delhi. After a few bike troubles, Jess and her team arrive in Delhi, reflecting on the unforgettable journey theyve shared together.

programme.title: Marriage Highs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Marriage Highs"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason reconnect during a romantic stay in Lake Tahoe, but Jason struggles keeping his cool while off roading the Rubicon Trail. Are Jasons high expectations too? And will these expectations shut them down on their next climb, Mt Whitney?

programme.title: Alpenglow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Alpenglow"
programme.desc: Jason and Tayler attempt to summit the highest peak in the continental US, Mt Whitney. However, during their time on ascent they run into some unexpected surprises that leave this mountain attempt one they will never forget.

programme.title: One More Round
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Love On The Rocks S1 - "One More Round"
programme.desc: A relaxing trip to Orcas Island takes a turn for the worst when plans begin to fall through; including the ferry ride back to the mainland. This mishap may leave them stranded for longer than expected, putting their final summit attempt at risk.

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: The Rise of Pabu-chan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Rhys Darby in Japan S1 - "The Rise of Pabu-chan"
programme.desc: The popularity of New Zealands mascot, Pabu-chan, grows at the Sapporo Snow Festival, and then he gets a chance to hit the big time. Rhys also travels to the Okinawa Islands in search of the beautiful and fleeting cherry blossoms.

Between delicious foods at taco stands to exploring bustling markets in Mexico City.

Split up along the way, they reunite in Jaisalmer where they experience quintessential Rajasthan, riding across the iconic dunes of the Thar Desert.

programme.title: The Unforgettable Journey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Roads Unknown India S1 - "The Unforgettable Journey"

The crew continues to Jaipur, uncovering more cultural treasures and reunites with Pulak for the final stretch to Delhi. After a few bike troubles, Jess and her team arrive in Delhi, reflecting on the unforgettable journey theyve shared together.

programme.title: Bay of Plenty / Rotorua
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Bay of Plenty / Rotorua"
programme.desc: Piri drifts around Lake Rotorua with Inia Maxwell trout fishing. And meets up with seven’s player, Joe Webber, to go long lining for snapper.

programme.title: Cape Runaway
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S2 - "Cape Runaway"
programme.desc: Piri visits Opotiki to check out the infamous Horse Sports. Then Piri goes fishing off the rocks for at Cape Runaway with local, Rawiri Waititi.

programme.title: Las Vegas, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Las Vegas, USA"
programme.desc: Brazilian Bboy Neguin is visiting his friend Bboy Ronnie in his hometown Las Vegas. Ronnie istaking Neguin to meet all the different artists and dancers who are able to make a living inVegas by doing what they love most: performing on stage.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.
