programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: To avoid self-harm, an intoxicated man is handcuffed to a booking bench. After fighting at a bar, a combative prisoner is arrested. Also, an unmarried couple squabbles during the booking process.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Uncooperative and agitated, a man complains officers are violating his rights. A “443” call is issued, and a deputy desperately needs help. Outside the cell block, there’s knockouts and bloody noses.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. One man fights with his girlfriend in a bathroom, another fights with his girlfriend at home, both are surprised they are arrested for domestic violence. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A ladies man smuggles womens underwear into jail. A woman arrested at a traffic accident is incredulous to discover that smoking marijuana while driving is against the law. A young man charged with a DUI tells guards he fears he may become pregnant behind bars.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. A young couple wonders how pot ended up in their possession. Officers are surprised at the amazing amount of pot one can smoke.

programme.title: The Beach Bum
programme.desc: The Beach Bum seuraa loppuun palaneen Moondogin (Matthew McConaughey) hillittomia epaonnenkolauksia hanen toimiessaan vain omien pelisaantojensa mukaan. Huikea tahtikaarti -Snoop Dogg, Isla Fisher, Zac Efron, Jimmy Buffett, Martin Lawrence ja Jonah Hill - takaa villin menon kumouksellissa uutuuskomediassa, jonka tarjoilee kasikirjoittaja-ohjaaja Harmony Korine.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: PT-valmentajat (Cobie Smulders ja Guy Pearce) saavat tehtavakseen saada uusrikas ja hyvin motivoitumaton asiakas (Kevin Corrigan) kuntoon. Pian tassa fiksussa ja hauskassa rakkautta ja ruumiinkuntoa kasittelevassa komediassa naiden kolmen elama ammatti- ja yksityiselama sotkeutuu umpisolmuun.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Kate antaa 30-vuotispaivan aattonaan Evielle ja Charlielle luvan jarjestaa itselleen pirskeet. Juhlista sukeutuu kuitenkin menneisyytta ja nykyisyytta sekoitteleva villi peli, ja tilanne riistaytyy kaikkien kasista.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Happy-Go-Lucky
programme.desc: Opettaja Poppy selviytyy optimisminsa turvin elaman pienista vastoinkaymisista ja levittaa ymparilleen iloa ja naurua.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: A Haunted House 2
programme.desc: Tassa hulvattomassa jatko-osassa Marlon Wayans palaa Malcolmina, joka saatuaan entisen demoninsa karkotettua aloittaa uuden elaman uuden tyttoystavansa ja taman kahden lapsen kanssa. Muutettuaan unelmakotiinsa Malcolmia vaivaavat jalleen oudot paranormaalit tapahtumat, eika talla kertaa vain talo ole kummitusten asuttama! Jamie Pressly, Cedric the Entertainer ja Essence Atkins ovat myos mukana.

programme.title: Amateur Night
programme.desc: Jason Biggs esittaa Guyta, palkittua, vasta valmistunutta arkkitehtia. Nyt han on kuitenkin tyoton, tuleva isa, joka etsii epatoivoisesti toita. Vaimonsa vaatimuksesta Guy vastaa netti-ilmoitukseen, jossa etsitaan ”kuljettajaa”. Guy kuvittelee toimittavansa pizzoja, mutta han huomaakin olevansa nykyaikainen sutenoori - han toimii kuskina ja sihteerina ilotytoille. Han tarvitsee rahaa, joten han tapaa Nikkin, piinkovan ja armottoman seksityontekijan, ja Nikin kaksi hulvatonta ja raavasuista kollegaa, Jaxin ja Fallonin. Guy, tuo vastentahtoinen kuski ja turvamies, paatyy rokkaavien naisten ja ressukoitten miesten maailmaan. Hurjan ja villin yon aikana, monen lahelta piti -tilanteen jalkeen,

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: The Details
programme.desc: Jeffin (Tobey Maguire) ja Nealyn (Elizabeth Banks) taydellinen elama viehattavassa esikaupungissa soljuu onnellisesti uomissaan. Idylli kaatuu kuitenkin hetkessa kun karvainen pesukarhuperhe muuttaa heidan takapihalleen turmelemaan jarjestysta. Pahimman sekasorron saa kuitenkin aikaan talon isanta Jeff, jonka pakkomielteeksi muodostuu havittaa tuholaiset keinolla milla hyvansa. Karvapallot vs. mies taistelu ja flirttailu naapurin Lilan (Laura Linney) kanssa johtavat lopulta armottomaan sahlaykseen uskottomuuteen, kiristykseen ja jopa elinten luovutukseen...

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Three Day Millionaire
programme.desc: Pohjois-Englannin Grimsbyhyn sijoittuva riehakas komedia sateen piiskaamien satamien nuorista kalastajista, jotka joutuvat tekemaan elamansa ryoston pelastaakseen kotikaupunkinsa. Unohtakaa Ocean’s Eleven, silla tassa tulee Grimsby’s Four.

programme.title: Kuukauden tyontekija (Employee of the Month)
programme.desc: Kaksi aarimmaisen kilpailunhaluista tukkukaupan tyontekijaa kilpailee ”Kuukauden tyontekija” -tittelista ja siita, kumpi voittaa kuuman uuden kassanhoitajan sydamen tassa hulvattomassa komediassa.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story
programme.desc: Daniel Radcliffe (The Lost City, Swiss Army Man, Harry Potter -elokuvat) on “Weird Al” Yankovic liioittelemattomassa tositarinassa aikamme suurimmasta muusikosta ja seksisymbolista. Elokuvassa nayttelevat myos Evan Rachel Wood (Westworld, Across the Universe) Madonnana seka Rainn Wilson (Konttori, Megalodon) Dr. Dementona.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: The Rules of Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, James Van Der Beek ja Ian Somerhalder tuovat elamaa ja naurua tahan rehelliseen, nokkelaan tarinaan yliopiston sosiaalisista ja seksuaalisista suhteista.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isnt fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not its up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of Americas westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteers head.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Nevada Jack McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) go undercover to catch jewelry smugglers in this vintage western from Monogram Pictures. This was one of the last films directed by John P. McCarthy (Song of the Gringo, The Oklahoma Cyclone), while Johnny Mack Brown would go on to find great success as Nevada Jack; this was the fourth of 19 films where he played the crime busting marshal.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didnt commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boys hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boys father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kates Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joes hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotels holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Custers Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western about a man avenging the murder of his parents. Other cast members include frequent Wayne sidekick George Gabby Hayes, plus Yakima Canutt, Sheila Terry, and Jack Rockwell. This Paul Malvern Production from director Robert N. Bradbury also features Earl Dwire, one of the great B-movie villains, as Zanti, the ruthless bandit who sets the action in motion.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 . This episode aired in 1951.

programme.desc: Pancho is taken hostage by a bank robbers sister.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. . The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a womans freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomezs camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her fathers honor after hes killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is in search of a missing miner and his daughter in this Lone Star Picture. Along the way, Drew rescues his pal Wabbi (Noah Beery Jr.) from card cheats who have framed him for murder. Youll find plenty of action and suspense in this vintage horse opera, originally distributed by the kings of the B western, Monogram Pictures!

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their fathers cattle empire.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Want an everyday car with extra power under the bonnet? The BMW 3-Series, Nissan 370 Z or Citroen CS DS3 are rather average cars. But as M-version, Nismo or Musketier, they get wild and become really powerful.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the The Walk at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Customized luxury vehicles visit The Walk, the glamorous Jumeirah Beach boulevard; car owners get their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: The BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS and Porsche Cayenne Turbo are among the strongest and fastest SUVs in the world; sports utility vehicles made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Packed with power, panache and charm, a diverse range of high-end SUVs from across the world shows how luxury comes in all sizes and shapes.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They represent the American lifestyle more than any other car: US SUVs and pickup trucks. They are extremely large, extremely powerful and extremely luxurious and they transport the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of Jaguar.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The story of Lamborghini.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 1960s and 1970s were golden years for Opel; Ascona, Manta, Rekord and GT, an Opel was more than just a car, and the company built one classic after another; today, these car models are all icons.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The S-Class in the 1950s era.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Insight into the significance of the BMW 3 series and its glorious generations-long journey.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka attends the highly ambitious and committed drag racing event Race Airport; the U.S. car dealer from Berlin takes about 11 seconds to finish the quarter mile with his 700-hp Camaro.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: The Nurburgring is the most dangerous, yet most beautiful racetrack in the world, and serves as a meeting point for racing icons and rare cars.

programme.title: Spotted

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A lot of work, attention to detail and passion is packed into a tuned show car. But it might take some time until a car like this is ready to stand on its own four wheels.

programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing.

programme.title: Tuning

programme.title: Tuning

programme.title: Classic Ride

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Even in the world of super sports cars, people get goose bumps if they hear the name Lamborghini; all over the world, these fighting bulls from Italy are famous for their spectacular design and massive power.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayenne Turbo and the Range Rover Supercharged are big, fast and have a lot of power, so they can even take on sports cars; the interiors of these cars feel like a luxurious living room.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: The Tushek TS600, a super sports car built in Austria, was limited to 33 units, extremely light and had a power/weight ratio that is on the level of GT3 racing cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Almost every car manufacturer has their own tuning company, where models improve in performance and get a sportier look; for many customers this is not enough; individuality is the key.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nissans all-wheel monster GT-R and the Porsche 911 with a turbo engine are tested for winter suitability in the Finnish Lapland.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GT4
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 is lighter, more powerful and faster than previous models; Porsche demonstrates its capabilities for achieving fast lap times.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: In Rons Garage antique scrap piles from the desert get turned into rolling pieces of art in accordance with customer specifications. If you want to cross the desert, Mercedes has the perfect vehicle.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 Avant isnt a boring whip at all, seeing that Audis Quattro GmbH get an output of 560hp out of the 4.2-liter V8 engine. But tuning company Meyer isnt satisfied enough.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Delving into the exceptional performance features of three high-powered cars: Mathilda Racings Scirocco GT-R1, Bentleys GT3 R, and Volkswagens Golf R.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: An up-close look at the power-packed customized versions of two popular luxury cars and the Stuck brothers mind-boggling talent on the driving tracks.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Want an everyday car with extra power under the bonnet? The BMW 3-Series, Nissan 370 Z or Citroen CS DS3 are rather average cars. But as M-version, Nismo or Musketier, they get wild and become really powerful.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 is the benchmark, when it comes to extreme estate cars, featuring 560 hp output combined with a maximum torque of 700 newtonmeters and an acceleration from zero to 100 km/h in 3.9 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: You want to feel like a race driver? The British car manufacture Radical can make your dreams come true.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Those living outside United States need to import cars the likes of Corvette C7 and Ford Mustang.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: For Porsche fans, its the ultimate fusion of road suitability and race track compatibility: The Porsche 911 GT3. With its 475 hp engine and a maximum torque of 440 Newton-meters, it accelerates from zero to 100 km/h in 3.5 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nowadays you associate Bentley with elegance and luxury. But ever since its establishment in 1919, the British brand enjoys successes in motorsports as well.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The T in the name of the Ferrari California T stands for Turbo, which is unusual for a brand like Ferrari. The California T is the first Ferrari to have a turbo engine under its hood since the legendary F40.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: For more than 50 years, the Porsche 911 has been one of the best sports cars in the world. But that doesnt slow down the competition from trying to take the crown. Often copied, never matched.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: It is one of the most spectacular automotive campaigns of the last 10 years: The Beast of the Green Hell. Stars of the video are four-time Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Its all about V8 engines on Supercars. Its strengths: pulling power being available in the lower rpm range, tremendous power and engine sound that leaves nobody unmoved. For the first time ever, the Aston Martin DB11 is equipped with a V8.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A rare look behind the scenes at some of the planets most exclusive factories.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Thanks to a new Mercedes-AMG engine, the Aston Martin DB11 V8 became lighter, louder and more aggressive; with a consumption of 3 liters and a top speed of more than 300 km/h the Porsche Panamera Hybrid is a station wagon with two faces.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Limousines all look the same and their only purpose is to increase the number on odometer display. Thats not true at all and Supercars proves the opposite.

programme.title: A Car For Irma
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV.

programme.title: Trophy Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket’s Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course.

programme.title: In The Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.title: Missing Teddy
programme.desc: Bean discovers that, in the world of organised crime, a teddy isn’t always a teddy. Sometimes it’s a rabbit.

programme.title: No Parking
programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Beans Bounty
programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: Bean fights a loosing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.title: Spring Clean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that cleanliness can be a filthy business.

programme.title: No Pets
programme.desc: His landlady smells a fish when Mr Bean gets a bird.

programme.title: A Ray of Sunshine
programme.desc: Sunbathing proves a more strenuous pursuit for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Birthday Bear
programme.desc: Mr Bean forgets his teddy’s Birthday - then gives him a treat to remember.

programme.title: The Mole
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses control of a pest and makes a mountain out of a molehill.

programme.title: Roadworks
programme.desc: Mr Bean is driven to distraction by diabolical decibels.

programme.title: The Sofa
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself with more than a spring in his step.

programme.title: Treasure!
programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.title: Homeless
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to let a room but no one will let him.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great.

programme.title: Chocks Away
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s hobby goes down in flames in his battle for air supremacy.

programme.title: Royal Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Buckingham Palace, Mr Bean meets the lady of the house.

programme.title: Young Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane.

programme.title: In the Pink
programme.desc: Mr Bean, badgered by a strange pink animal, warms to the creature when it shows its true colours.

programme.title: Dinner For Two
programme.desc: When invited to dinner by Mr Bean, it’s probably best to take your own sandwiches.

programme.title: The Ball
programme.desc: Mr Bean makes it to the top of the ladder… and gets stuck.

programme.title: Toothache
programme.desc: Mr Bean bites off more than he can chew when he attempts DIY dentistry.

programme.title: Haircut
programme.desc: Mr Bean has a bad hair day.

programme.title: Neighbourly Bean
programme.desc: Bean’s pursuit of a quiet life ends in a major row.

programme.title: Nurse!
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers being in hospital isnt always a bed of roses.

programme.title: Dead Cat
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to replace his landlady’s cat after an unfortunate ‘accident’.

programme.title: Super-Trolley
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.title: Magpie
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets in a complete flap when he befriends a feathered thief.

programme.title: Cat-Sitting
programme.desc: Mr Bean is forced to look after his worst enemy.

programme.title: The Bottle
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses his bottle.

programme.title: Goldfish
programme.desc: Mr Bean nearly gets fed to the fish!

programme.title: Inventor

programme.title: Car Trouble

programme.title: Restaurant

programme.title: Gadget Kid

programme.title: Best Of The Hangout
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Ghost Baby
programme.desc: A group of mischievous ghosts, led by a child, haunts a community causing mayhem everywhere, while dealing with their own supernatural issues.

programme.title: Uche Who Works In Lekki
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Uche Who Works In Lekki is a black comedy about an Ad agency executive, who makes a grave mistake by overpromising a payment to a hard-to-get Afrobeat star without the knowledge of his agency and must do everything possible to rectify it before his boss finds out.

programme.title: The Pizza Guy
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Jessica, finding herself at the crossroads of her life decides to dive headfirst into dating, but doesn’t have much luck. Just when she’s about to give up, she meets George, a charismatic pizza delivery guy. As their connection deepens, Jessica decides to date George in secret, fearing judgement from her friends. Will her insecurity let love blossom or will it die out?

programme.title: Love and Everything In-Between
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Love And Everything In Between tells the story of Amanda and Jude and how their unlikely meeting spins into something beautiful. When Amanda is robbed on her first day in Lagos and has no where to go, rich boy Jude offers her a place to stay in his family home, which leads them to begin to work together.

programme.title: Get Over It
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Muna tries to help her friend, Hauwa, who has just been dumped by her boyfriend. Muna begins a YouTube series to help her friend get out of that post relationship depression by encouraging her to despise men, but she falls in love with their very annoying neighbour instead. Tired of hiding her new relationship, she is stuck with the options of either risking her friendship and career or risking a chance at love.

programme.title: AMC Fashion Insider - Enioluwa
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep7
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep8
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep9
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep10
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: Long Distance
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A man is confined to a wheelchair as a result of his wifes actions. His mother moves in with them and constantly reminds the wife that it is her fault and the wife uses every opportunity to escape from the stifling situation. The family is thrown into chaos when a male nurse is hired.

programme.title: Free Man
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Efe has been living his life the way he wants it, sowing his wild oats with every woman he meets until the mothers of his children decide to hold a meeting to discuss his business. His baby mamas bring his children over for a vacation with their father, ruining his chance at a good weekend with his new catch.

programme.title: Double Wahala
programme.desc: When her sugar daddy develops a heart attack and suddenly dies in her apartment during a romp, a young woman must find the quickest way possible to dump his body without raising suspicion. Help comes in the form of her neighbour, a yahoo-yahoo boy who masquerades as a native doctor, but when the chief’s body disappears, what was a previous case of small trouble suddenly becomes double wahala.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Can Make A Right
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Leo is a dancer and Tina is a young writer who has just moved to Lagos in search of greener pastures and to get her book published. These two totally different persons must live together in the same apartment. Their resentment for one another eventually turns to an intense romantic affair.

programme.title: We Tha Boyz
programme.desc: Four jolly teenagers decide to help their friend, Tokunbo, in his plans to get the love of Chioma, however, a rival gang is also vying for her attention. Tokunbo’s parents go out of town and they decide to throw the ultimate house party to impress her. As simple as the plan seems, in reality however, they get in several problems in order to pull it off and end up almost ruining the house.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet Special 2025
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet moments which brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet Special 2024
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet moments which brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Salamatus Rhapsody
programme.desc: Salamatu, a young woman torn between her love for hip-hop and her family’s strong traditional values and expectations, must win her father over to support her love for hip hop.

programme.title: A Different Spice
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Daniel’s life comes crashing down when he catches his wife, Emma, cheating on him, making him believe that his near perfect life has been a lie. He seeks revenge by deciding to sleep with his mother-in-law but that plan soon leaves him full of shame.

programme.title: Twisting Knives
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A young lady who believes she is in an incredibly happy marriage with her husband, finds out, just before his death, that he had cheated on her for years and had kept a second family away from her. Her misery is compounded when she finds out that her mother-in-law had knowledge of her husband’s other family. Bitterness eats at her as she believes everyone knew about her late husband’s treachery and she decides to twist knives in their hearts so they too will feel the pain of betrayal.

programme.title: Love Box
programme.desc: Two long-term unmarried lovers relocate to Lagos for greener pastures and experience relationship with other people before settling down. Their affair relationship becomes threatened as they begin to make new friends and discover new lifestyles.

programme.title: Double Crossed
programme.desc: When Eric refuses to seek medical remedy for his sexual problems, Adanna discreetly satisfies her starved urge from a close family associate.

programme.title: Love Across
programme.desc: Coming out of a very bad marriage, Osas, is trying to pick the pieces of her life and find means to emotionally and mentally take care of her children. When she meets a younger man, Dafe, who falls deeply for her, everything looks new as she experiences true joy and love.

programme.title: Learning Love
programme.desc: A career woman goes behind her husbands back in a bid to delay having the children he desperately wants. Can their marriage survive such a betrayal?

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Victor decides to take drastic action when mistreatment from his boss, Mr Okeke, becomes too much to bear. He decides to steal from the man but things get complicated when he finds Mr Okeke’s heavily pregnant wife at home instead of cash.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Stella suffers a devastating loss when her husband leaves her suddenly. She slowly finds happiness when she falls for the doctor that treats her, but things get complicated when her husband comes back to fight for their marriage.

programme.title: Ìrètí
programme.desc: When a young lady full of life and vigor is diagnosed with cancer, she is forced to hold on to hope for survival, by channeling her passion and skill for costume design.

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: The Auction
programme.desc: Bamidele, a famous musician whose career is taking a downturn, finds unexpected love when he is put up for auction!

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always felt left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is as equally important as her twin.

programme.title: Bellas Drift
programme.desc: Bella, plagued by distrust for men over the nasty outcome of her previous relationship, closes shop on relationships with guys. She meets Charles, introduced to him as a great guy by her housemate Flora, but soon old patterns start to form. Will she lose out on a great relationship because of the past?

programme.title: Fall Guy
programme.desc: Sammy and Austin are childhood friends who have always had each other’s backs right from their teenage years. Their friendship is made in heaven and they will sacrifice almost anything for each other in business, money and women, especially Women.

programme.title: I Love My Neighbour - Ep9
programme.desc: Comedy that shows the life, misunderstandings, gossip and conflicts of a group of neighbours who have their differences and deep down cannot stand each other.

programme.title: All Day - Its 1976!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Great Song - Stupid Title! 1970-79
programme.desc: Robin Banks with 30 amazing songs, 30 nonsense titles! Fancy a Dreadlock Holiday or a drive down the 2468 Motorway? This is where to come!

programme.desc: All 7 music videos and the theme song from the 1978 movie in order - you know the story, and were all hopelessly devoted to the tunes! Theyll go by like Greased Lightnin!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Tonys 25 Biggest Pop Groups!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Tonys 25 Biggest Pop Groups!
programme.desc: Pop Groups ruled the 70s and came from all quarters! From Germanys Boney M, Swedens Abba and the UKs Queen, Police and Showaddywaddy - Tony Blackburn counts down the definitive 25.

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Groovy Little Numbers! Top 25

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year of Apollo 13, The Beatles split and more happily the launch of "Skippy The Bush Kangaroo" here in the UK!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant and Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings and pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - Jesus Christ Superstar, Are You Being Served? and George, Zippy and Bungle in Rainbow!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines served with a side or order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House and the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts and inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, Ding A Dong" won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits and headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster and that years top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked Abigails Party, Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1978
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the penultimate year of the decade when Anna Ford became ITVs first ever female news reader and the TV licence fee climbed to Â£25!

programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the last year of the decade! It was the year the brand new Sony Walkman launched in Japan and Elton John performed 8 concerts in the USSR.

programme.title: Sonias 30 Great Girls!

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming To Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Aktiivinen, liberaali ja edistyksellinen oikeustieteen opiskelija Maya tuo uuden poikaystavansa kotiin jouluksi - kertomatta perheelleen, etta han on valkoinen. Arvaa, kuka tulee joulupaivalliselle?

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: A Christmas Movie Christmas
programme.desc: Sisarukset Eve ja Lacey toivovat joulua, joka olisi kuin suoraan elokuvamaailmasta. Aivan yllattaen he huomaavatkin olevansa keskella jouluelokuvaa. He heraavat satumaisessa ja taydellisessa ”Joulukaupungissa”, jossa on taydellinen joulu ja jossa kaikki on vain aivan taydellista. Mita enemman sisarukset tutkivat kaikkea jouluun liittyvaa, sita enemman he tajuavat, etta taydellisyys ei ehka olekaan perinteisen joulun oikea tarkoitus. Ehka onkin olemassa toisenlainen taika, johon kuuluvat palaneet piparkakut ja kuivunut joulukinkku…?

programme.title: Bennettin Laulujuhla
programme.desc: Bennettin ja Songin perhe palaa jouluksi uutisten kera. Rouva Song odottaa lasta 14 adoptiolapsen joukkoon. Perheen on lyottaydyttava yhteen haastaakseen kiinteistokehittajan, joka haluaa sulkea setansa monitoimitalon vammaisille ja vaarassa oleville lapsille. Rakkaudella, tiimityolla ja joulun taikuudella paiva pelastuu!

programme.title: Avain Jouluun
programme.desc: Kun tyytymaton tonttu nakee tilaisuuden vallata pohjoisnavan- han kaantaa taikakoneella aikaa taaksepain Joulupukista- joka alkaa nuortua nopeasti. Joulumuori on vangittu ja karkkitankovankilassa. Uskollisen tontun, pikkutyton, jolla on taika-avain - ja teini-ikaisen joulupukin on kaannettava aikaa eteenpain - ja pelastettava joulun tulevaisuus.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: Joulumaa
programme.desc: Joulumaa on nahnyt parempiakin paivia Glindan menehdyttya, ja Julesin taytyy tehda valtavia paatoksia.

programme.title: 12 Joulukoiraa
programme.desc: Tyoton leski-isa lahettaa tyttarensa tatinsa luo kaupunkiin- joka on kieltanyt koirat. Matkalla kouluun han loytaa koiranpennun ja paattaa pitaa sen - vaikka rankkuri on hanen kannoillaan. Hanen pitaa selvittaa, mita koirille tapahtuu- ja hurmata pormestari ikimuistoisimmalla joulunaytelmalla.

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: Furry Little Christmas
programme.desc: Suurkaupungin elainlaakari kaatuu pikkukaupungin laakariin, kun tama paattaa jarjestaa New Yorkin joulun hanen kotikaupungissaan Vermontissa.

programme.title: A Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Joulu lahestyy isoin askelin, kun Paula suostuu hieman vastahakoisesti poikaystavansa kosintaan. Isoaiti Jane tuntee, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan ja kutsuu Paulan luokseen maalle piristaakseen tyttoa. Paula vierailee laheisella viinitilalla ja tapaa sen omistajan Geryn. Sarja yhteensattumia lahentaa heita toisiinsa. Seudun yli kulkee myrsky, joka pakottaa Paulan jaamaan yoksi. Ja pian han ymmartaa, etta juuri heidat on tarkoitettu toisilleen...

programme.title: Joulun ihmemaa
programme.desc: Joulun aika NYC:ssa on kaikkea muuta kuin ihanaa kamppailevalle taiteilija Heidi Neillille.

programme.title: P2
programme.desc: Myohaan jouluaattona toissa oleva nainen joutuu psykoottisen ja pakkomielteisen turvamiehen vangiksi. Pysakointitalossa ei ole muita, joten naisen on paettava omin voimin.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Pup Star -perhe on kasvanut! Uusien pentujen, Cindyn, Rosien, Charlien ja Brodyn tulee oppia, mita joulu oikeasti tarkoittaa. Kun Pup Starin pahikset juonivat pilaavansa joulun, pennut paatyvat pohjoisnavalle pelastamaan joulupukin ja jouluhengen. Heidan seikkailunsa on taynna uusia pentumaisia lauluja, jotka levittavat joulun riemua vuoden ympari.

programme.title: Joulukuppikakkuja
programme.desc: Kun perheen leipomo joutuu ehka sulkemaan ovensa ennen joulua - siskokset Kimin ja Ginan on lyottaydyttava yhteen - kansallisessa leivontakilpailussa voittaakseen paapalkinnon. Kilpailijoiden ja tikittavan kellon maailmassa - tarvitaan joulun ihme leipomon pelastamiseksi. He saattavat loytaa paljon suuremman palkinnon kuin toivoivat.

programme.title: Lahetys joulua
programme.desc: Kun hanen lahetyskumppaninsa paattaa lahtea Amerikan suosikkiaamuohjelmasta, Veronika Daniels ilmoittaa valitsevansa uuden juontajakansa kourallisen ehdokkaiden joukosta, joihin kuuluu paikallinen New Yorkin uutislahettaja Charlie Fisher.

programme.title: Joulukievari
programme.desc: Kun liikenainen Jennifer kuulee vanhempiensa lahtevan matkoille jouluksi ilman hanta, han paattaa jattaa San Franciscon humun taakseen ja lahtea Alaskaan tutustumaan isoaidiltaan perinnoksi saamaansa kievarrin, joka on tarkoitus kunnostaa ja myyda.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas List
programme.desc: Hiljattain sairaalaan joutunut isoaiti antaa viimeisena toiveenaan tyttarelleen Michellelle ja tyttarentyttarelleen Saralle listan ennen joulua yhdessa tehtavista juhlatunnelmaa nostattavista asioista toivoen, etta naiden kahden kokema seikkailu korjaisi heidan suhteensa.

programme.title: Tonttutytto Pelastaa Joulun
programme.desc: Kun New Yorkin mafia sieppaa joulupukin juuri ennen joulua- Tonttutytto, aivan tavallinen tonttu, tulee apuun. Han lyottaytyy yhteen ystavansa Saihkyn kanssa- pysayttaakseen pahikset, loytaakseen joulupukin ja pelastaakseen joulun.

programme.title: Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: Tom on luonut uran auttamalla asiakkaita, jotta nama loytaisivat rakastetulleen taydellisen lahjan. Joulun lahestyessa Tomin paras ystava Paul pyytaa Tomia keksimaan lahjan tyttoystavalleen Jennylle. Kun Tom tutustuu Jennyyn paremmin, asia mutkistuu, koska han huomaa rakastuneensa kaverinsa tyttoystavaan. Tyotehtava on melkein hoidettu, mutta Tom on pahoillaan, koska hanen ainoa mahdollisuutensa loytaa sielunkumppani on kariutumassa.

programme.title: Tonttumies
programme.desc: Joulupukki jattaa tontun pelastamaan Harperin perheen kurjalta joululta. Tonttu perheineen saa enemman kuin toivoi, kun lapset auttavat tonttua loytamaan voimansa - ja identiteettinsa orastavana supersankarina.

programme.title: Avain Jouluun
programme.desc: Kun tyytymaton tonttu nakee tilaisuuden vallata pohjoisnavan- han kaantaa taikakoneella aikaa taaksepain Joulupukista- joka alkaa nuortua nopeasti. Joulumuori on vangittu ja karkkitankovankilassa. Uskollisen tontun, pikkutyton, jolla on taika-avain - ja teini-ikaisen joulupukin on kaannettava aikaa eteenpain - ja pelastettava joulun tulevaisuus.

programme.title: Jouluharmonia
programme.desc: Lahjakkaan laulaja-lauluntekijan sydan sarkyy, kun kuuluisa muusikkopoikaystava jattaa hanet juuri ennen joulua. Han palaa kotikaupunkiinsa, jossa tapaa vanhoja ystavia - ja tapaa komean poikamiehen, jolla on ollut sydansuruja. Yhdessa he loytavat uudelleen musiikin, romantiikan, perhesiteet - ja joulun taian.

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Joulukuppikakkuja
programme.desc: Kun perheen leipomo joutuu ehka sulkemaan ovensa ennen joulua - siskokset Kimin ja Ginan on lyottaydyttava yhteen - kansallisessa leivontakilpailussa voittaakseen paapalkinnon. Kilpailijoiden ja tikittavan kellon maailmassa - tarvitaan joulun ihme leipomon pelastamiseksi. He saattavat loytaa paljon suuremman palkinnon kuin toivoivat.

programme.title: Puppy Star Christmas
programme.desc: Pup Star -perhe on kasvanut! Uusien pentujen, Cindyn, Rosien, Charlien ja Brodyn tulee oppia, mita joulu oikeasti tarkoittaa. Kun Pup Starin pahikset juonivat pilaavansa joulun, pennut paatyvat pohjoisnavalle pelastamaan joulupukin ja jouluhengen. Heidan seikkailunsa on taynna uusia pentumaisia lauluja, jotka levittavat joulun riemua vuoden ympari.

programme.title: Ihme Joulujarvella
programme.desc: Kun teinipoika menettaa parhaan ystavansa ja isansa joulun aikaan- han jattaa lempilajinsa jaakiekon ja hylkaa ystavansa. Kun jaakaukalo ilmestyy jaatyneelle jarvelle hanen kotinsa lahelle, han muistelee hyvia aikoja.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.
