programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: 2025 iQFOiL World Championships - Live Delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Aarhus, Denmark, became the venue for the iQFOiL World Championships from July 4-11, 2025, offering the worlds best windsurfing athletes a test of skill and speed. This world-class sailing venue has a reputation for pushing competitors to their limits

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 and 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europes premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix
programme.desc: October 1st - 4th, 2020, In Lonato, Italy, the worlds leading concentration camp gear kart racers will strive for glory and honor to win the ultimate award - the title of World Champion.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships
programme.desc: The world championship for karting in the OK direct drive category for junior and senior racers is finally upon us, as the field descends on Kartodromo Algarve in Portimao, Portugal, just two weeks after Formula One returned to this incredible country.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski and Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 1 - Italy
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Moscow (RUS)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2019 - Gstaad (SUI)
programme.desc: The Snow Bike Festival 2019 is THE event of the young snow bike boom and brings together like-minded athletes from all over the world. With the extra wide and grippy wheels you are ready for your exciting ride in the snow.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) has expanded to Asia! The season opener of the worlds most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders takes place in Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Deutschnofen (ITA)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Kicking Horse, Golden BC (CAN)
programme.desc: After an epic start to Winter 2019 in Hakuba, Japan, the worlds best make their way across the Pacific to North America for the second competition of FWT19 at the legendary Canadian Rockies resort of Kicking Horse, Golden BC.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Championships 2019 - Latzfons (ITA)
programme.desc: Im Gegensatz zu kunstlichen Rodelbahnen bestehenden Naturbahnen aus BergstraSSen und -wegen. Naturbahnrodeln erfordert eine vollig andere Technik als auf einer Kunstbahn. Im Ziel entscheiden Hundertstelsekunden uber Sieg oder Niederlage.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: With two events in the pipeline and a fiercely competitive race for the world title quickly unfolding, the best in the world will get their chance to “Hold The Line” in Fieberbrunn as FWT19 enters the European leg of the season.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: Its that time of the season again when points mean everything: racing for the world title, qualifying for the final in Verbier and the 2020 season. The stage is set for what is sure to be a hard-fought competition in Ordino Arcalís

programme.title: Episode 50
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 50

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #14: Open Faces and X Over Ride
programme.desc: This episode is all about talent. First, The young guns of the global freeride scene gather in Austria to battle it out for the world titles. Then, an FWT Qualifier and an FWT Challenger event will decide who will advance to the elite level of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: The Mt. Logan Wanderers
programme.desc: At 5959m, Mount Logan is the 2nd highest peak in North America, and certainly one of the wildest mountains in the world. To reach it, Helias Millerioux, Alex Marchesseau, Thomas Delfino, and Gregory Douillard did not choose the easy option.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: FIA Championship Middle East - Saudi Baja Hall
programme.desc: The Saudi Baja is an important event in the FIA Middle East Baja Cup series. It takes place from January 30 to February 1, 2025 and serves as the opening round of the FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and the FIM Bajas World Cup.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 1
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #18: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #11: Epic Series – Season Preview
programme.desc: Today we take you on an exciting journey. Get ready for an exclusive preview of the Absa Cape Epic and the Epic Series 2025 - the ultimate test of endurance, skill and teamwork.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #12: Mediterranean Epic by Scott 2025
programme.desc: February 6-9, 2025, Oropesa del Mar (ESP): The Mediterranean Epic is a UCI 4-stage race where mountain bikers can enjoy mountain biking to the fullest on the course around Oropesa del Mar in the province of Castellon in Spain.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2025 - Prologue
programme.desc: The Cape Epic 2025 is one of the worlds most important mountain bike stage races in the rugged landscape of South Africa. The event promises intense competition and unforgettable adventures

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (KZ/KZ2)

programme.title: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuyas duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institutes Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: You Show Em
programme.desc: Its a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institutes diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: Its all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Battle Under The Big Top
programme.desc: Its a battle under the big top, but no ones clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuyas duel school!

programme.title: Circus Surprise
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declans deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuyas down in the dumps, but Principal Boyles not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance - Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 1
programme.desc: To gain eligibility to join the Junior Youth Championship, Yuya has to win 4 official duels consecutively. He ends up dueling is Michio Mokota, a cuisine Duelist with high popularity among the housewives.

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Fight for a Friend
programme.desc: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

programme.title: Farewell for a Friend
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 1
programme.desc: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 2
programme.desc: As Quinton and Treys devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya faces a ferocious attack against Michio Mokotas Cooking Duel.

programme.title: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: Its a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuperieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuyas future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuyas battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuyas danger-filled future is becoming a reality

programme.title: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist whos been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.title: Challengers Assemble
programme.desc: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out whos the best duelist in the world!

programme.title: Somethings Fishy
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allies deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: Fusion Foes
programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institutes dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gongs old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down - a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuyas days in the spotlight be done for?

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya cant get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Soras one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shays heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Soras sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks hes seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya cant believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other... and everything in sight!

programme.title: Warped Dimensions
programme.desc: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmates ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

programme.title: A Duel Personality
programme.desc: Yuyas opponent is Isao Kachidoki from the Ryozanpaku School in the second round of the Maiami Championship.

programme.title: Stealth Warriors
programme.desc: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

programme.title: Bracing for Battle
programme.desc: Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!

programme.title: Battle Fields
programme.desc: Its time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship! With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!

programme.title: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes

programme.title: Danger Zones
programme.desc: As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!

programme.title: Obelisk Assault
programme.desc: Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!

programme.title: Dragons Vengeance
programme.desc: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

programme.title: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter whos hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

programme.title: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimensions elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declans web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: Kings vs Dragons
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there’s more to lose than just his allowance! Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City’s most feared motorcycle momma?

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

programme.title: City Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuyas dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Synchro Sector
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms… and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.title: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Scream for the Green
programme.desc: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they’re introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma and Astrals race to face Don Thousand is stopped cold by the hot-blooded Alito, now brainwashed by the Barian deity! Can they think fast enough to free Alito of Don Thousand, or will he take the two down for the count?!

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Astral duel desperately to try and turn an old enemy into their newest ally, but with Don Thousand in Alito’s corner, Yuma and Astral find themselves up against the ropes!

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: Vector sets his sights on squashing Marin and Dumon, and there’s nothing Shark can do but watch his sister and best friend squirm before his eyes.

programme.title: Barian vs. Barian
programme.desc: The thunderous battle between Marin, Dumon and Vector shatters expectations as it nears its startling end! Meanwhile, Alito stands tall against his former friend, the Barian behemoth - Girag!

programme.title: Vector the Victor
programme.desc: Marins duel with Vector charges to its climactic conclusion! Can Marin outduel this venomous villain, or will Vector remain invincible?!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 1
programme.desc: The long foreshadowed faceoff is finally here! Kite and Mizar go toe-to-toe to settle who is the one true Galaxy-Eyes master!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 2
programme.desc: The fierce face-off between Kite and Mizar soars to new heights as their battle to determine the one true Galaxy-Eyes master roars to a finish!

programme.title: The Forsaken Palace
programme.desc: Nash races to face Vector, but with Vectors enhanced strength, he may be speeding towards his own demise!

programme.title: Clash of the Emperors
programme.desc: While Nash and Vectors danger-fueled duel hits dizzying new heights of havoc, the truth behind Vector’s dark past is revealed!

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: Yuma teams up with an unlikely ally to take down the great Barian deity, Don Thousand! Can this twosome draw out a victory, or will Don Thousand douse any hope these heroes have of being victorious?

programme.title: The Source Code
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark’s battle with Don Thousand takes a treacherous turn when the great Barian deity reveals he can rewrite their cards into entirely different cards! Can Yuma and Shark defeat a foe who can change their every move?

programme.title: Duelings Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Showdown in the Slammer
programme.desc: Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!

programme.title: Heros Fall
programme.desc: With his deck on the line, Yuya looks to rock the cell block and KO the Kingpin!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Yuya is determined to do the impossible and escape from The Facility, but when friends become foes his plan to break out, breaks down!

programme.title: Fight for Freedom
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals try to flee The Facility, their big breakout takes a terrible turn when their escape route leads them straight into the security guards!

programme.title: Match with the Master
programme.desc: The opening ceremonies of the Friendship Cup kick into overdrive as Yuya squares off against the Master of Faster - Jack Atlas!

programme.title: Traits of a Traitor
programme.desc: With the Friendship Cup about to kick off, Yuya learns about tournament champion Jack’s rise to the Tops!

programme.title: Crows Crew
programme.desc: The first duel of the Friendship Cup has the green light as Crow and Gong put the pedal to the metal!

programme.title: Rileys Reveal
programme.desc: Riley’s been chosen to Turbo Duel Shinji, but the battle hits a speedbump when Yuya steps in to stop the duel and keep his pint-sized pal in one piece!

programme.title: Common Cause
programme.desc: For Shinji to inspire the Commons to stand up to the Topsiders, he must first take down Moon Shadow! Can Shinji’s monsters swarm together and deliver the sting of defeat, or will Moon Shadow’s ninjas silence all the buzz?

programme.title: A Concerted Effort
programme.desc: Yuya’s friends are forced to face off in a duel where the loser is banished forever! No matter who wins, Yuya loses!

programme.title: The Gift of Grit
programme.desc: As the Friendship Cup picks up the pace, Jack Atlas takes a timeout to reveal the secrets of his past!

programme.title: Duel Consequences
programme.desc: Officer 227 is in hot pursuit to take Yuya down - all the way down to the underground! Can Yuya outrun the long arm of the law, or does 227 have his number?

programme.title: Turbotrainers
programme.desc: Sylvio finally takes center stage at the Friendship Cup, but will he crash and burn under the spotlight?

programme.title: Turning Point
programme.desc: An escapee from the underground brings word to Yuya on how to take control of the Friendship Cup!

programme.title: A Traitor Unmasked
programme.desc: Shay’s duel with Dennis turns into a battle of wits when he tries to force Dennis to reveal his dark secret

programme.title: Shays Revenge
programme.desc: After finding out that Dennis is from the Fusion Dimension, Shay sets his sights on getting revenge!

programme.title: Plans of Attack
programme.desc: Yuya and Roget reflect on their pasts to make plans for the future!

programme.title: A Cons Game
programme.desc: Zuzu goes deck-to-deck against Sergey – an ex-con who’s looking to “X” out the competition!

programme.title: Rebel Road
programme.desc: Zuzu’s been hurt, but Yuya can’t race to her rescue until he defeats Shinji first!

programme.title: Road to Rebellion
programme.desc: Shinji’s Battlewasps are stinging Yuya to submission! But does Yuya have one last card that will tip the scales in his favor?

programme.title: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Yuya’s newest ally is… Roget? Questions are raised that plunge Yuyas reputation into a freefall!

programme.title: Battle Birds
programme.desc: Crow and Shay soar down the track in a high-flying battle where the loser will crash land into the underground!

programme.title: Warriors of the Air
programme.desc: Shay and Crows winged warriors fight, claw and flap towards the finale…until an unexpected guest decides to join their duel!

programme.title: A Matter of Trust
programme.desc: Zuzu’s on the run from Sector Security, but can a little help from some little friends help her avoid big trouble?

programme.title: A Plan and a Promise - Part 1
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup heats up as Yugo and Celina tear through the tricky twists and turns of a transforming duel track!

programme.title: A Plan and a Promise - Part 2
programme.desc: Yugo’s in for a bumpy ride as he’s forced to zigzag his way across a duel track that’s been mapped for mayhem by Roget!

programme.title: Against All Odds
programme.desc: Furious over Celinas failure at the Friendship Cup, Roget sends a squad of Sector Security to seize her.

programme.title: The Many Dimensions of Yuya
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Crow takes a turn for the worse when Roget takes control of Yuya’s mind!

programme.title: Wake Up Call
programme.desc: Crow gets a crash course on double crossing when Yuya pulls a U-turn on their friendship!

programme.title: Hunted and Hounded
programme.desc: Obelisk Force has invaded New Domino City to capture Zuzu and Celina! Can Yuya and his friends stop this unstoppable force?

programme.title: Down With the Underground
programme.desc: Barrett has returned to snatch Celina back to Duel Academy – unless the Lancers can stop him!

programme.title: Chain Game
programme.desc: Barrett has chained up Yuya and his monsters! Can Yuya break his shackles before Barrett breaks away with Celina?

programme.title: Tragic Reunion
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Barrett comes to a shocking conclusion when a mind-controlled madman drops into their duel!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Jack’s most dangerous duel ever as he takes on Roget’s maniacal minion - Sergey!

programme.title: Road Rage - Part 2
programme.desc: Can Jack Atlas best Sergey, when Sergey combines the best of man and machine?

programme.title: Martial Flaw
programme.desc: Roget declares himself leader of New Domino City! Can the Lancers overthrow this madman, or will Roget’s Sector Security end any chances they have?

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup finale is finally here! Jack and Yuya square off to see who will become New Domino City’s newest champion!

programme.title: Making it Mine
programme.desc: Jack pushes Yuya to his limits in the Friendship Cup finale! Does Yuya have the dueltaining skills to dethrone the Master of Faster, or will Jack’s rule reign supreme?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Bombay to Bangkok
programme.desc: Chef Shankar Bhatawdekar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Mumbai along with his widowed mom. After an encounter with a gangster named Khan, who finds out that Shankar has stolen a valuable item that belonged to his son, Jamal, sends Shankar fleeing to Bangkok, Thailand, along with a team of medical professionals. He manages to conceal the item amongst medical supplies, and poses as a medical professional himself. He blunders his way as a medico, arousing suspicion, especially by Dr. Rati, compounded by the arrival of Khans son, Jamal, and his romance with Jasmine, a volunteer and a part-time masseuse, She, too, is attracted to him - without knowing that this attraction will soon get...

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Simmba
programme.desc: Sangram Bhalerao aka Simmba is an unabashedly corrupt policeman who does not hesitate to make the local ganglord Durva his brother from another mother to ensure a regular inflow of bribes. Meanwhile, Simmba falls in love with Shagun, who runs a catering service next to Miramar Police Station in Goa, where he is stationed. He even finds a sister in a 19-year-old medical student, Aakruti, who teaches orphans in her free time. Soon, Aakruti stumbles upon a drug smuggling ring run by Durvas brothers and is brutally raped and killed. This twist in the tale transforms Simmba and forces him to choose the righteous path.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E28 Jodha Akbar S4 E28
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Uri - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: The film is a dramatized account of the retaliation by Indian Army to the 2016 URI attack. Major Vihaan Singh Shergill is a valiant army man who aces in strategic operations. However, when his mothers Alzheimer starts progressing rapidly, he bids goodbye to his border adventures and requests for a transfer to an army base in the Capital so that he can spend some time with her. During that period, Vihaans brother-in-law Karan who is also his fellow army-man gets killed in the Uri attack. This incident triggers Vihaan to join the surgical strike operation and go all guns blazing to avenge the loss of his slayed fellow officers in the Uri attack.

programme.title: King of Hearts

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E341 Second Chances S1 E341
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E341 This is Fate S1 E341

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E341 Undercover Love S1 E341
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E95 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E95
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.
